BUYCODE: 700206041
COMMENTS: Free breakfast and Wi-Fi near multiple interstates equal major bonus perks at La Quinta Inn & Suites Birmingham Hoover.  All 133 rooms at the four-story La Quinta Inn & Suites Birmingham Hoover offer free Wi-Fi and flat-panel HDTVs as well as microwaves coffeemakers and mini-fridges. Nosh on free daily breakfast and work it off in the fitness center. Guests can relax with a dip in the seasonal heated pool and hot tub. Laundry facilities and free on-site parking are additional pluses. Pets are allowed. Located three miles south of the I-459 and I-65 junction this La Quinta Inn is within 20 miles of I-20 I-22 and I-59 and about a two-hour drive from both Chattanooga and Atlanta. Shop for treasures three miles away at Riverchase Galleria. Guests can also visit Aldridge Gardens within four miles and the Birmingham Botanical Gardens and the Birmingham Zoo 13 miles away. A three-mile drive leads to the Oak Mountain Amphitheater while downtown's Birmingham Museum of Art is 15 miles north. Birmingham-Shuttlesworth International Airport is 20 miles away.<br><br>Dogs up to 25 pounds are allowed. There are no additional pet fees. Dogs must be leashed and cleaned up after.

COMMENTS: With free continental breakfast complimentary high-speed internet access and a gym the pet-friendly La Quinta Inn Birmingham/Cahaba Park South offers our guests a variety of amenities and a convenient location at wallet-friendly rates. At the three-floor 99-room La Quinta Inn guests begin each morning with a generous complimentary continental breakfast including waffles bread muffins pastries hot and cold cereal fruit and coffee. They can work off those calories in the on-site gym with cardio equipment. All interior-corridor rooms (non-smoking available) offer free high-speed internet work desks and cable TV with premium channels. Pets can stay by your side for an extra fee. Other amenities include copy and fax services a guest laundry and free parking with space for buses and RVs. Located off U.S. 280 the hotel is a straight shot to downtown and the Birmingham-Jefferson Convention Complex (10 miles). The University of Alabama Birmingham is nine miles and Samford University is seven. Upscale shopping is 15 minutes away at the Riverchase Galleria and The Summit shopping center is just a five-minute drive. Birmingham-Shuttlesworth International Airport is 14 miles from the hotel.<br><br>Dogs of all sizes are allowed. There are no additional pet fees. Dogs may not be left unattended, and they must be leashed and cleaned up after. Dogs are not allowed in the food areas.

COMMENTS: Complimentary breakfasts memory foam beds and free Wi-Fi draw our guests to the non-smoking La Quinta Inn & Suites Daphne. All 67 non-smoking rooms on three floors at La Quinta Inn & Suites Daphne include cable TVs with premium channels beds with signature memory-foam mattresses microwaves mini-fridges and free Wi-Fi. Fill up on free breakfast each morning: The hotel's continental spread features make-your-own waffles hot and cold cereals muffins fresh fruit coffee juice and more. Maintain your exercise routine at the hotel's fitness room outfitted with cardio machines. Sunbathe and swim in the seasonal outdoor pool and relax in the hot tub. Catch up on clothes cleaning at the guest laundry. There's also a conference room and a business center offering fax and copy services. Pets are allowed for an additional fee. Parking is free. La Quinta Inn is off I-10 at Highway 181 across the street from a multitude of retailers and restaurants at the Eastern Shore Shopping Mall. Guests are near Timbercreek Golf Club a half-mile away. The hotel is eight miles from the heart of Daphne and nearly 14 miles from downtown Mobile. Local attractions like the USS Alabama Battleship Memorial Park are within 15 miles. Mobile Regional Airport is nearly 30 miles west of the hotel. Pensacola International Airport is one hour away in Florida.<br><br>Dogs of all sizes are allowed for no additional pet fee; there is a pet policy to sign at check-in. Dogs must be removed or crated for housekeeping, and crated when left in the room alone. Dogs are not allowed in the common areas of the hotel.

COMMENTS: Internet access and hot breakfast are complimentary and even pets stay free at La Quinta Inn Decatur which also offers free parking. Identifiable by its trademark red roof tiles the two-story La Quinta has 53 rooms with pillowtop mattresses flat-panel TVs with premium cable channels and free high-speed internet. Microwaves and mini-fridges are perfect for when you get the munchies and coffeemakers get you going in the morning. Don't miss the free breakfast buffet which includes hot options like golden-brown waffles with your choice of toppings along with a range of baked goods fresh fruit and coffee. The hotel provides free newspapers and offers a seasonal outdoor pool. Pets are permitted and parking is available both free of charge. On the main thoroughfare of Beltline Road La Quinta Inn is one-and-a-half miles from the Decatur Mall and the restaurants that surround it. For outdoors pursuits Wheeler National Wildlife Refuge is 10 miles from the hotel while Point Mallard Park is five miles away. It's two-and-a-half miles to educational fun at Cook's Natural Science Museum. Huntsville International Airport is 20 miles northeast.<br><br>Dogs of all sizes are allowed. There are no additional pet fees. Dogs must be leashed, cleaned up after, and crated when left alone in the room.

COMMENTS: Hearty morning goodies Wi-Fi parking and nearby shopping are included in the attractive amenities provided by La Quinta Inn & Suites Dothan making it one of the most popular hotels among our guests in Dothan. Free Wi-Fi cable TV coffeemakers mini-fridges and microwaves are provided in all 130 rooms at the five-story property. The continental bBreakfast is complimentary every morning and there's an outdoor grill guests can use to make other meals. The pool is open year-round and there's also a fitness room for keeping in shape. The hotel also has a business center and guest laundry facilities on-site. Parking is free and pets are welcome for an additional fee. The hotel sits between Northside Mall and Shops on the Circle three miles from Dothan Opera House and Wiregrass Museum of Art in the heart of Dothan. It's less than 20 miles north of the Florida border. Guests are also within ten minutes of the excitement of Adventureland Theme Park and flights to and from Dothan Regional Airport are within a five-mile drive north.<br><br>Dogs of all sizes are allowed for no additional pet fee; there is a pet policy to sign at check-in.

COMMENTS: Offering free waffle breakfast and free Wi-Fi plus an indoor pool the non-smoking La Quinta Inn & Suites Fultondale also has easy access to downtown Birmingham and local attractions. Each of the 68 tastefully decorated rooms at the three-story La Quinta Inn & Suites features free Wi-Fi a flat-panel TV a microwave a mini-fridge a coffeemaker and a hairdryer. All rooms are non-smoking. Guests wake up to a free hot breakfast that includes make-your-own waffles hot and cold cereals muffins fruit and all-you-can-drink coffee and juice. Guests can relax in the heated indoor swimming pool rain or shine. A fitness center and full business center with meeting facilities are both available on-site. Other thoughtful extras include free newspapers electronic checkout and guest laundry facilities. Pets are allowed for free.  La Quinta Inn & Suites is located five miles north of Birmingham just off I-65 at exit 267. Downtown Birmingham and attractions like the Birmingham Museum of Art and the Alabama Jazz Hall of Fame are a 10-minute drive away. The Robert Trent Jones Golf Trail in Oxmoor Valley is a 15-minute drive away and Oak Mountain State Park is a 25-minute drive away. Birmingham-Shuttlesworth International Airport is nine miles away.<br><br>Dogs of all sizes are allowed for no additional pet fee; there is a pet policy to sign at check-in.

COMMENTS: A convenient location plus freebies like breakfast and Wi-Fi access make for an enjoyable stay at the La Quinta Inn & Suites Birmingham Homewood.  All 129 rooms in this five-story hotel are comfortably furnished with flat-panel TVs and 30 channels of HD programming. Free internet access hairdryers and coffeemakers are part of the room package. Mornings start with a complimentary continental breakfast buffet of items like waffles hot and cold cereals bagels muffins and lots of fresh coffee and juice to get you going. The hotel has a seasonal outdoor pool to enjoy in warmer weather and a fitness center to keep your workout regimen on track. Pets are welcome with an additional fee and parking is free.  The hotel is two miles from Brookwood Village and five miles from the Birmingham Civil Rights Institute Robert Trent Jones Golf Trail and Samford University. McWane Science Center and the Birmingham Zoo are six miles away. It's eight miles to Birmingham International Airport.<br><br>Dogs up to 50 pounds are allowed. There are no additional pet fees. Dogs must be quiet, well behaved, leashed, and cleaned up after.

COMMENTS: Guests can surf the web for free or feast on the free breakfast at the non-smoking La Quinta Inn & Suites - North Mobile Satsuma which also offers cozy pillowtop mattresses a pool and a convenient highway-side location. All 79 rooms at the three-story La Quinta Inn offer pillowtop mattresses 37-inch flat-panel TVs free Wi-Fi coffeemakers microwaves mini-fridges work desks hairdryers and hand-held massaging showerheads; some rooms also have sofa beds. A boardroom and business center help corporate guests get the job done and the on-site fitness center lets fitness buffs get the blood pumping. At the end of a long day the seasonal outdoor pool and soothing hot tub offer an oasis of relaxation. Breakfast is free and includes make-your-own waffles hot and cold cereals bread muffins fresh fruit coffee and juice. Laundry facilities and a small convenience store are also available on-site. Parking is free and pets are allowed for a fee. La Quinta Inn & Suites is off I-65 adjacent to the Pilot truck stop and within walking distance of several fast food restaurants. Satsuma's city center is one-and-a-half miles away. The hotel is 15 minutes from the University of Mobile and from the Chickasabogue Park nature refuge which offers excellent hiking and biking. Downtown Mobile landmarks such as the USS Alabama the Alabama Cruise Ship Terminal Hank Aaron Stadium and the Oakleigh Historic House are a 25-minute drive from the hotel. Mobile Regional Airport is 23 miles away.<br><br>Dogs of all sizes are allowed for no additional pet fee; there is a pet policy to sign at check-in.

The two-story La Quinta Inn houses 70 rooms featuring free high-speed internet coffeemakers hairdryers ironing facilities and cable TV. Breakfast is on the house each morning. Jump into the seasonal outdoor pool for a refreshing dip during the summer months. Guests keep in shape with a workout in the fitness room. Laundry facilities and complimentary parking are available on-site. Pets are welcome at the hotel for an additional fee. La Quinta Inn lies off Highway 167 about 20 minutes from the Louisiana border. Downtown El Dorado's attractions including historic Newton House and business-filled Main Street are less than two miles away. A five-minute drive west leads to South Arkansas Community College and the El Dorado Conference Center. Moro Bay State Park is a 30-minute drive northeast. COMMENTS: Breakfast and evening reception are on the house at the non-smoking La Quinta Inn and Suites a favorite lodging of our guests. The low-rise non-smoking La Quinta Inn and Suites Russellville is pet-friendly and houses 67 rooms that come with free Wi-Fi 42-inch flat-panel TVs and premium cable channels. Mini-fridges microwaves and coffeemakers are also included. As for recreation you'll find an indoor pool hot tub and fitness room on site. The business center and conference facilities help road warriors stay productive. Breakfast is free each morning and features favorites like waffles eggs muffins fruit and sausage; on weekday evenings guests are treated to manager's receptions with drinks and snacks. Parking is free. La Quinta offers easy access to I-40 and is walking distance from Arkansas Technical University. This 100-room hotel on four floors offers free high-speed internet access throughout. All rooms have free local calling premium cable TV pillowtop mattresses and plenty of space to stretch out or get some work done. The hotel provides a free breakfast buffet with hot and cold items and a free newspaper each morning. Business services such as copy and fax facilities are available at the front desk and there's even an on-site laundry facility for guests. After a day of driving working or touring the area head for the indoor heated pool and hot tub with plenty of natural light or hit the fitness center. COMMENTS: Flat-panel TVs free Wi-Fi and local calls a complimentary breakfast buffet and parking along with a pool and hot tub create a comfy stay at La Quinta Inn and Suites Flagstaff. Rooms include desks and coffee makers and local calls are free. Guests can relax in the outside gazebo or enjoy the seasonal outdoor pool and hot tub. There's a 24-hour fitness center for work-outs. La Quinta is located just west of the Northern Arizona University campus less than a mile from the Skydome and under two miles from the university's art museum. COMMENTS: Free waffles complimentary Wi-Fi and workouts combine with lush landscaping a pool and nearby shopping to keep our guests comfy-cozy at La Quinta Inn Scottsdale.  Microwaves mini-fridges coffeemakers desks free Wi-Fi and local calls and cable with premium channels and pay movies are included in all 140 rooms at the three-story La Quinta Inn. Pay video games are also available. In the morning guests can dig into the complimentary breakfast buffet including waffles hot and cold cereals breads fruit and beverages. Days call for relaxing outdoors in the gazebo or year-round heated pool and hot tub. Guests can also enjoy a workout any time of day or night in the 24-hour fitness room. Limited shuttle service to local area sites is on the house and so is parking. Coin-operated laundry facilities are available for guest use and pets are welcome for an additional fee.  Located in North Scottsdale La Quinta Inn is less than a half-mile from the retail hub Pima Crossing and less than 10 minutes from the training center at the Salt River Fields at Talking Stick. Guests can reach championship golfing at the Tournament Players Club 10 minutes north or Camelback Golf Club and McCormick Ranch Golf Course within a five-mile drive. The hotel is also situated 17 miles north of Phoenix Sky Harbor International Airport. <br><br>Dogs of all sizes are allowed. There are no additional pet fees. COMMENTS: The free breakfast and complimentary Wi-Fi are two often-cited favorites at the non-smoking La Quinta Inn Tucson East situated minutes from everything that brings you to Tucson. The two-story La Quinta offers 140 non-smoking rooms with free Wi-Fi cable TV AM/FM alarm clock radio hairdryer iron and ironing board. Larger rooms feature microwaves fridges and outdoor seating areas. A complimentary breakfast served every morning including make-your-own waffles. The hotel has an outdoor pool with a hot tub in a shaded patio just the thing after a day in the Southwestern sunshine. Other on-site amenities include a guest laundry photocopy center and conference/meeting space. Pets are welcome for a fee. Parking is on the house.La Quinta Inn is east of downtown Tucson just a 10-minute drive from Davis Monthan Air Force Base. The base is home to one of the world's largest collections of aircraft housed in the Pima Air and Space Museum. There are a number of restaurants in the immediate surroundings of the hotel and dozens more within a five-minute drive. The Park Place Mall is a five-minute walk from the hotel. Downtown and the Tucson Convention Center are seven miles away and Tucson International Airport is 11 miles away.<br><br>Dogs of all sizes are allowed. There are no additional pet fees. Dogs must be leashed and cleaned up after.

COMMENTS: Free airport shuttle free breakfast free Wi-Fi and free parking are among the valuable perks that our guests enjoy at La Quinta Inn Vancouver Airport where pets are welcome. This hotel has 74 rooms some designated non-smoking spread over five floors. All rooms feature recliners refrigerators coffeemakers in-room safes free Wi-Fi and premium cable TV with pay movies. Begin your day with La Quinta's free breakfast. The hotel features a small indoor pool and hot tub and an on-site fitness room as well as an atrium-style lobby gardens and a patio. Additional amenities include a business center and guest laundromat. The hotel provides a free airport shuttle and free on-site parking. Pets are welcome.  Located fewer than four miles from Vancouver International Airport La Quinta is one mile from downtown Richmond and one block from a station where guests can catch the SkyTrain for the 20-minute trip into downtown Vancouver and its many attractions. Landsdowne Mall is adjacent to the hotel and VanDusen Botanical Garden is five miles away. Within a half-hour drive guests can visit Stanley Park TELUS World of Science and Granville Island.  <br><br>Dogs of all sizes are allowed. There are no additional pet fees. Dogs must be leashed, cleaned up after, and crated or removed for housekeeping. The pet floor is on the 5th floor, which is a smoking floor; however, there are non-smoking rooms on that floor.

COMMENTS: With free breakfast Wi-Fi and parking a year-round outdoor pool and quick access to downtown entertainment and outdoor activities La Quinta Inn Bakersfield South offers guests popular amenities at a price that won't break the bank. Breakfast is included at the three-story La Quinta and features waffles pastries bagels cereals breads fresh fruit and both hot and cold beverages. Guests have a choice of 129 rooms featuring coffee makers free Wi-Fi and local calls and flat-panel TVs with premium HD channels and multiple plug features. The outdoor pool is heated and open year-round there's a shaded gazebo for keeping cool on sunnier days and business services are available for guests. Non-smoking rooms are available. Pets are welcome for an additional fee and coin-operated laundry facilities are offered on-site. Parking is free. Located conveniently next to Highways 178 and 99 La Quinta places guest within a five-minute stroll of Buck Owen's Crystal Palace and fewer than two miles from downtown Bakersfield. When looking for a little outdoor fun guests can head to Lake Ming and Kern River Golf Course just a 20-minute drive away; and flying out is a breeze with Meadows Field Airport's location just five-and-a-half miles north.<br><br>Dogs of all sizes are allowed. All 112 non-smoking rooms on three floors feature a microwave refrigerator coffeemaker and free local calls. Stay fit on the fly in the gym and let your cares melt away by the heated outdoor pool and hot tub (open year-round). A business center and coin-op laundry help you put your best foot forward. Parking is free and pets are welcome for an added fee. Located just off I-5 La Quinta is a half-mile from South Carlsbad State Beach. Drive two-and-a-half miles to shop till you drop at the Carlsbad Premium Outlets. It's the same short distance to The Flower Fields. Drive four miles north for a day of fun at Legoland or to check out the Museum of Making Music. The shops and restaurants in Carlsbad Village are 10 minutes north and Batiquitos Lagoon is two miles south. McClellan-Palomar Airport is five miles east and San Diego International Airport is 31 miles south.<br><br>Dogs up to 40 pounds are allowed. There are no additional pet fees. Dogs must be leashed and cleaned up after.

COMMENTS: Free breakfast with waffles free Wi-Fi and an outdoor pool welcome guests at the historic La Quinta Inn & Suites Irvine Spectrum in Old Town Irvine between I-5 and I-405 Converted from a grain warehouse this historic building a block from the train tracks offers 148 rooms on four floors. Each room comes with free Wi-Fi an HDTV coffeemaker hairdryer and iron with an ironing board. Make your own waffles for breakfast in the morning and in the afternoon go for a dip in the outdoor pool with a hot tub. A fitness room and guest laundry are available. Ask about a local shuttle. Pets are welcome for a fee and parking is free. Off I-5 in the center of Old Town Irvine La Quinta Inn is next to several family restaurants and about a mile from Irvine Medical and Science Complex. COMMENTS: Impressive TVs and other amenities abundant breakfast buffets and money-saving extras like free internet access make the non-smoking La Quinta Inn & Suites Moreno Valley one of the area's most popular hotels among our guests. Identifiable by its trademark barrel-tile roof the three-story La Quinta has a fetching facade. Along with free Wi-Fi access the 61 handsomely decorated rooms all of them non-smoking have up-to-date touches like 40-inch flat-panel TVs with satellite channels microwaves and refrigerators. In-room coffeemakers help get you going in the morning as does the complimentary breakfast buffet with golden-brown waffles baked goods and fruit juices. It's served in a dining area with soaring ceilings. Splash around in the heated indoor pool or work out on the cardio machines in the fitness room. There's also a business center and a guest laundry. Parking is free. Just off Highway 60 La Quinta is a brisk stroll from the Moreno Valley Mall. I-215 is about two miles away so you can get to nearby destinations like March Air Force Base in minutes. The University of California-Riverside is six miles northwest. For hiking and other outdoors activities Box Springs Mountain Park is five miles northwest and Lake Perris State Recreation Area is 10 miles southeast. LA/Ontario International Airport is 24 miles west John Wayne Airport is 50 miles southwest and Palm Springs International Airport is 52 miles east.<br><br>Dogs of all sizes are allowed. Dogs may not be left alone in the room.

A guest laundry and a restaurant and lounge round out the convenient facilities. Parking is free and pets are allowed also at no charge. The La Quinta Inn is in South San Francisco about 10 minutes from the San Francisco International Airport. The free airport shuttle also takes you to the BART rail station where you can hop the subway and get downtown in about 30 minutes and visit Union Square a San Francisco must-see or head towards Fisherman's Wharf for shopping and seaside dining. COMMENTS: The modern non-smoking La Quinta Inn & Suites Santa Barbara Downtown offers our guests well-equipped rooms an outdoor pool and a great location. The three-story La Quinta Inn & Suites Santa Barbara offers 68 non-smoking rooms offering contemporary style and outfitted with 39-inch flat-panel TVs coffeemakers microwaves mini-fridges and free Wi-Fi. Fax and printing capabilities are on hand in the business center and the fitness room and the outdoor pool offer recreation and relaxation. The hotel serves a complimentary breakfast each morning that includes hot waffles and parking is available for a nightly fee. Pets stay free. The La Quinta Inn & Suites is on State Street a few blocks from the heart of downtown Santa Barbara and two miles from the beach. You'll find lots of dining options within walking distance or you can head to Stearns Wharf two miles away to sample some fresh seafood. Stroll a half-mile down State Street and soak in the culture at the Santa Barbara Museum of Art. Stroll another few blocks down State Street and you are in a shopping paradise. The hotel is nine miles from Santa Barbara Airport and a mile-and-a-half from the Santa Barbara Amtrak Station.<br><br>Dogs of all sizes are allowed. Dogs may not be left alone in the room.

This non-smoking hotel has 56 rooms on three floors and each room includes free Wi-Fi a microwave a mini-fridge a flat-panel cable TV a coffeemaker a hairdryer and ironing gear. Guests can enjoy a complimentary breakfast including waffles cereal muffins fresh fruit sausage and eggs. The low-rise hotel features 142 traditional rooms with high-tech amenities such as free Wi-Fi access and flat-panel HDTVs equipped with a plug-and-play feature for connecting personal electronics. Other thoughtful amenities include hairdryers coffeemakers and business-friendly voicemail phones with dataports and free local calling. Non-smoking rooms are available and pets are welcome for an additional fee. Guests also enjoy a daily breakfast buffet that includes waffles cereals and pastries. In addition to the outdoor pool and relaxing hot tub La Quinta offers free parking. La Quinta is off Highway 101 four miles south of downtown Ventura and within a 10-minute drive of Ventura City Hall and Ventura College. Spectacular outdoor attractions just 10 minutes away include Ventura Harbor and the family-friendly Marina Park Beach. There is plenty of shopping just 15 minutes away at Camarillo Premium Outlets and golfing at the Ventura Municipal Golf Course is three minutes from the hotel. La Quinta is less than five miles from Oxnard Airport.<br><br>Dogs of all sizes are allowed. There are no additional pet fees. Dogs must be leashed and cleaned up after. Dogs must be crated or attended to for housekeeping.

COMMENTS: Our guests love the location as well as comfortable rooms at the La Quinta Inn Colorado Springs. Set against a background of the eastern slope of the Rocky Mountains the hotel gives you easy access to the region's most famous sights. The three-story hotel identifiable by its barrel-tile roof has a warm welcoming feel. The 105 rooms have up-to-date touches like free Wi-Fi so you can stay online for as long as you like. Surrounded by tall trees the outdoor pool is a great place to relax after hiking or biking through the nearby national parks. The free breakfast buffet served in a cozy breakfast area off the lobby will help get you going in the morning. If you're traveling with the family dog La Quinta Inn Colorado Springs is one of the most pet-friendly hotels in the area. You won't even be charged extra for the privilege.  Off the major highway of I-25 La Quinta Inn is on the way to most of the area's natural wonders. Garden of the Gods one of the biggest draws is six miles southwest. It's on the way to Pike's Peak reachable by car or cog railroad. Ute Valley Park is three miles northwest and Pulpit Rock Park is three miles northeast. Head to the landscaped courtyard for a dip in the seasonal outdoor pool and hot tub or make time for an indoor workout in the fitness room. Breakfast is free and includes waffles boiled eggs pastries fruit and more. Pets are welcome. Parking is free. La Quinta is in the Lakewood area a 20-minute drive from downtown Denver. You'll find several dining options within easy walking distance. A number of local bus stops and big-name shops are less than a mile away. The Red Rocks Amphitheater ?? a scenic outdoor venue ?? is a 10-minute drive from the hotel. Denver International Airport is 25 miles away.<br><br>Dogs of most sizes are allowed; no extra large dogs. There are no additional pet fees. Dogs may only be left unattended in the room if they will be very quiet and well behaved, and leave the Do Not Disturb sign on the door. Dogs must be leashed.

COMMENTS: A top-ranking pet-accommodating contender offering free internet and a tasty complimentary breakfast say our guests La Quinta Inn and Suites Denver Louisville Boulder receives praise for its spacious digs and more. This three-floor hotel is home to 120 tastefully dressed rooms where guests have to tear themselves away from new flat-panel TVs with 30 channels of HD programming. Guests dig free high-speed internet access and the option of non-smoking and pet-accommodating digs too. Dishing out waffles eggs pastries bagels muffins and more the free breakfast buffet ?? served in a lovely sun-drenched room ?? gets impressive feedback. Guests can work out as hard as they like at the on-site fitness room or take it nice and easy by the outdoor pool and hot tub. Parking is free. Pets are allowed. Right off the Denver Boulder Turnpike the hotel surrounds guests with the lure of retail and restaurants within a half-mile and a favorite shopping mall within a one-mile drive. Guests hungry for even more are within a three-mile ride to Flatiron Crossing. Within a 15-minute drive guests can swing up to University of Colorado and Pearl Street's pedestrian-mall charm or fly down to the Butterfly Pavilion a mecca for those enchanted with all things butterfly. Boulder Municipal Airport is nine miles. Denver International Airport is 35 miles.<br><br>Dogs of all sizes are allowed. There are no additional pet fees. There is a pet waiver to sign at check in, and a cell number needs to be left with the front desk if your pet is left alone in the room. Also, place the Do Not Disturb sign on the door so housekeeping does not enter. There is a specified pet area where dogs are to be taken, and they must be leashed and cleaned up after.

COMMENTS: Wall-mounted HDTVs in every room and an indoor pool with mountain views are just two of the amenities that make the value-priced non-smoking La Quinta Inn & Suites Loveland a top-rated choice of our guests. This three-story hotel is part of an events park encompassing an amphitheater courtyards patios and a Tiffany fountain. Guests enjoy views of either the fountain or the Rockies from all 69 non-smoking rooms. A pillowtop mattress and 400-thread-count sheets encourage sleeping in ?? you can use the mini-fridge microwave and coffeemaker to make breakfast ?? though early risers get waffles fresh fruit and more at the free breakfast buffet. There's free high-speed internet in all rooms and a business center for working guests. Those with time to relax can enjoy mountain views from the indoor heated pool and hot tub after a workout at the 24-hour fitness center. Other amenities include laundry facilities and a convenience store. Pets are allowed and parking is free. The hotel is four miles west of Loveland with the city's walking trail along one side of the property and a golf course across the street. Benson Sculpture Park is three miles away. Entrance to the Rocky Mountain National Park is 30 miles away. You can reach Boulder in under an hour or Denver in a little over an hour. Denver International Airport is 60 miles away.<br><br>Dogs up to 50 pounds are allowed for no additional pet fee; there may 2 dogs that total 50 pounds or 1 dog up to 50 pounds per room, and there is a pet policy to sign at check in.

COMMENTS: A heated pool flat-panel TVs free breakfast and on-the-house internet add up to a convenient stay for guests at La Quinta Inn & Suites Pueblo. La Quinta Inn & Suites hosts 105 rooms on four stories. All accommodations have flat-panel HDTVs multi-plug panels and coffeemakers; some also include microwaves and mini-fridges. Non-smoking accommodations can be requested. Daily breakfast and high-speed internet access are both complimentary. Fitness-minded folk keep up with their workout routines in the exercise room and then cool off with a dip in the heated outdoor pool (open seasonally). Pets are allowed and parking is free. La Quinta Inn & Suites is off I-25 38 miles south of Colorado Springs. It's less than five miles north of the Historic Arkansas River Walk and the Pueblo Convention Center in central Pueblo. A three-mile drive east lands guests at Colorado State University's Pueblo campus. The action continues seven miles away at the I-25 Speedway and 15 miles away at Pueblo Motorsports Park. COMMENTS: Complimentary breakfast free Wi-Fi a heated indoor pool and hot tub top the list of thoughtful amenities at the non-smoking La Quinta Inn & Suites Rifle. At this three-story La Quinta 114 non-smoking rooms and suites feature modern furniture and crisp bedding while select rooms include jetted tubs. All boast microwave/mini-fridges combos coffeemakers and cable TVs with HBO. Free Wi-Fi and voicemail phones with free local calling help you stay in touch. Wake up to a free newspaper and a satisfying free breakfast before heading out for work or play. You can print boarding passes send a fax or answer emails in the business center and then take a relaxing dip in the heated indoor pool and hot tub. There's also a fitness room and a convenience store. Pets are welcome for a fee. Parking is free. La Quinta is near the Meeker/Rio Blanco and Piceance Basin areas a mile from downtown Rifle. Within minutes of the hotel guests can enjoy golf whitewater rafting hiking mountain biking skiing rock climbing and fishing in some Colorado's top-rated waters. Rifle Falls State Park is nine miles away the renowned Glenwood Hot Springs is 30 minutes away and the Sunlight Ski Resort is within an hour's drive. The hotel is 60 miles from Grand Junction Regional Airport.<br><br>Dogs of all sizes are allowed for an additional pet fee of $10 per night per room; there is a pet policy to sign at check-in. Dogs must be crated when left alone in the room.

An indoor pool and hot tub offer a place to refresh and relax after a busy day. The hotel provides a fitness center and a guest laundry. Pets are welcome and parking is free. Corporate guests stay on top of their workloads with the help of the on-site business center.  For fun check out the seasonal outdoor pool. Parking is free as is the local shuttle to Tweed Airport and other area attractions. Pets are welcome.La Quinta is half-a-mile from I-95 near the junction of I-91 in the Long Wharf/New Haven Harbor area. For service to New York City hop a train at Union Station one mile away. The hotel is three miles from downtown New Haven and Yale University the Chapel Street Historic District Peabody Museum of Natural History and the Shubert Theatre. Silver Sands State Park is 20 minutes west and the carousel at Lighthouse Point Park is 15 minutes south. Tweed New Haven Regional Airport is five miles south Hartford's Bradley International Airport is 50 miles north and New York City's airports are within 80 miles.<br><br>Dogs up to 50 pounds are allowed for no additional pet fee; there is a pet policy to sign at check-in. Dogs must be crated or removed for housekeeping.

Parking is available for a charge. The La Quinta Inn & Suites is right on the beach a mile north of shopping dining and nightlife at Ocean Walk Shoppes. Race down to the Daytona International Speedway for an all-access tour of NASCAR's world-famous course (a 13-minute drive). In a 20-minute drive you can measure yourself next to a manatee or stroke the stingrays at the Marine Science Center; scale the 203 steps of Ponce Inlet Light Station Florida's tallest lighthouse; or sharpen your swing on the two 18-hole championship courses at LPGA International. The hotel is six miles from Daytona Beach International Airport.<br><br>A dog up to 20 pounds is allowed. There is a $50 refundable deposit, and no discounts apply to a room with pets. There is a total of 5 pet friendly rooms, and 2 of these are non-smoking. Dogs must be leashed and cleaned up after.

COMMENTS: Free high-speed internet access free continental breakfast and free parking are some of the extras our guests appreciate at La Quinta Inn Fort Lauderdale Tamarac East.  This pet-friendly hotel has three floors interior corridors and 101 rooms. Rooms feature flat-panel TVs with high-definition channels and coffeemakers. You can surf the web courtesy of free high-speed internet access. Guests can silence their grumbling tummies with hot waffles and cold fruit at the free continental breakfast. You can splash into the sparkling outdoor pool or soak in some rays on the sundeck. The front desk provides 24-hour copy and fax services. Parking is free.  La Quinta Inn is on West Commercial Boulevard just two miles from Florida's Turnpike which provides quick access to the South Florida area. You can find bargains and see a drive-in movie at the Swap Shop four miles away. Guests can get lucky at the Hard Rock Seminole Casino an 18-minute drive. The hotel is 13 miles from Fort Lauderdale - Hollywood International Airport. <br><br>Dogs of all sizes are allowed. There are no additional pet fees. COMMENTS: Enjoying free breakfast free Wi-Fi and a free airport shuttle our guests are impressed with the non-smoking La Quinta Inn & Suites Fort Myers Airport and its easy convenience to the runway and the freeway. A value-priced lodging that really rolls out the red carpet this hotel proves just how good La Quinta Inns can be. The three-floor 73-room property offers spacious accommodations with in-room comforts such as pillowtop mattresses free Wi-Fi refrigerators and microwaves. Hotel amenities include a free daily breakfast with make-your-own waffles a fitness center a heated indoor pool a hot tub a business center and laundry facilities. Additional perks include a complimentary airport shuttle available during select hours and a pet-friendly policy where four-legged companions can stay free of charge. Parking is also free and those without wheels can take advantage of the free airport shuttle. Located just off I-75 La Quinta Inn & Suites is five miles from Southwest Florida International Airport. There are numerous restaurants within a three-minute drive of the hotel and the semi-private Olde Hickory Golf and Country Club is a seven-minute roll down the road. Other top attractions include Florida Gulf Coast University a 15-minute ride and Fort Myers Beach well worth the 30-minute cruise west.<br><br>Dogs of all sizes are allowed for no additional pet fee; there is a pet policy to sign at check-in. COMMENTS: Attractive rooms a refreshing outdoor heated pool in a private courtyard and a long list of freebies earn raves for La Quinta Inn Gainesville.  All 134 attractively furnished rooms in the four-floor La Quinta have free high-speed Wi-Fi access and free local calling. Every morning guests are welcome to a free breakfast of waffles hot and cold cereals bagels muffins and fresh fruits with all the hot coffee tea and juice you can drink. Enjoy your breakfast with others or by quietly reading your complimentary newspaper. For the business traveler a business center offers copying and other services to lighten your load on the road. When the day is done the outdoor pool and sundeck await. The hotel also offers its guests passes to a local fitness center. Parking is free at this hotel and with pet-friendly policies no one gets left behind.  La Quinta Inn is less than 15 minutes from the University of Florida and downtown Gainesville is about five miles from the hotel. The hotel has 148 pet-friendly guestrooms in a 5-floor building. Rooms come with desks premium cable TV with pay movies and video games and coffee/tea makers. Pack a lunch because some rooms have microwaves and compact fridges. Surf away with free wired Internet in the rooms and free Wi-Fi in the lobby. Swim in the heated outdoor pool set in an attractive courtyard with a terrace and gazebo. Relax in the soothing spa tub or work your body in the on-site fitness center. The hotel also has laundry facilities and free parking.  La Quinta Inn Orlando Airport North is just a two-mile free shuttle ride north of the airport. PHONE: 727-545-5611
STATE: FL
LAT: 
BUYCODE: 700201417
COMMENTS: The central location free Wi-Fi free continental breakfast heated outdoor pool and spacious rooms with flat-panel TVs add up to an attractive deal for our guests at La Quinta Inn Tampa Bay Pinellas Park Clearwater. In the 115 rooms at this three-story La Quinta Inn guests will find free Wi-Fi flat-panel TV with HD channels a coffeemaker and an iron with ironing board; non-smoking rooms are available. Complimentary newspapers and continental breakfast are also provided for a morning pick-me-up. The heated outdoor pool helps vacationers relax and the meeting facilities bring business travelers together. Laundry machines are available. Pets are allowed and parking is free. This inn is just off Highway 19 with easy access to I-275. Guests can take in a Tampa Ray Rays game at Tropicana Field seven miles away or enjoy the many beautiful Gulf beaches nine miles distant.  For dining a family restaurant is in the parking lot and several chain restaurants are within a mile. Tampa International Airport is 15 miles away.<br><br>Dogs of all sizes are allowed. There are no additional pet fees. Dogs must be leashed and cleaned up after. Dogs must be healthy; tick and flea free, and be removed for housekeeping.

LAUNDRYROOM: 
PHONE: 954-476-6047
STATE: FL
LAT: 
BUYCODE: 700201451
COMMENTS: With a free breakfast complimentary in-room Wi-Fi and a heated outdoor pool and hot tub La Quinta Inn & Suites Fort Lauderdale Plantation offers lots of conveniences to make your stay comfortable. The four-story La Quinta Inn Plantation offers 131 rooms with flat-panel TVs with plug-and-play connectivity and over 30 channels of HD programming. Free in-room Wi-Fi makes it easy to update your status or check your email from the comfort of your room. You'll always have a hot cup of java close by thanks to the in-room coffeemakers. Rooms with microwaves and mini-fridges are available as are non-smoking rooms. The complimentary breakfast includes hot waffles and a tempting assortment of pastries cereals fruit juice and coffee. Soak away stress in the heated outdoor pool and hot tub or work off those breakfast calories in the fitness center. Copy and fax services are available on site. Parking is free. Pooches are permitted at this property. The hotel is located less than a half-mile from The Fountains and the Broward Mall which offer lots of dining and shopping options practically at your doorstep. Outlet shopping at Sawgrass Mills is five miles away. Enjoy sand and surf at the Fort Lauderdale beaches 11 miles from the hotel where you can also catch your cruise ship. Golfers have plenty of chance to practice their swings at one of the four courses within two miles of the hotel including Jacaranda and Plantation Preserve Golf Courses. The hotel is approximately 15 miles from Fort Lauderdale International Airport.<br><br>Dogs up to 20 pounds are allowed. There are no additional pet fees. Dogs are allowed in smoking rooms only. Dogs must be well behaved, leashed, and cleaned up after. Pets are allowed in smoking rooms only.

COMMENTS: With a complimentary breakfast an outdoor pool and rooms with microwaves mini-fridges and free Wi-Fi La Quinta Inn & Suites Plantation at Southwest 6th Street provides good value at a location near the area's most popular attractions. The four-story hotel offers 104 rooms with microwaves mini-fridges coffeemakers TVs with expanded cable channels and Nintendo games. Non-smoking rooms may be requested. Surf the internet from the comfort of your room with free Wi-Fi. Save your cell phone minutes; local calls are free. The complimentary breakfast features everyone's favorite ?? hot waffles. Soak in some sunshine while splashing in the outdoor pool or work up a sweat in the fitness room. Parking is free. Pets are permitted with some restrictions. The hotel is eight miles from the sunny beaches of Fort Lauderdale. Pick up a new swimsuit or a beach towel at the Broward Mall adjacent to the hotel or The Fountains a half-mile away. There are lots of dining options to choose from within a half-mile of the hotel. Golfers can hone their swings at Plantation Preserve Golf Course or Jacaranda Golf Club both less than a mile away. Cheer on the Dolphins at Sun Life Stadium 15 miles away or catch a cruise at the Fort Lauderdale cruise terminals eight miles away. The hotel is 12 miles from Fort Lauderdale International Airport.<br><br>A dog up to 25 pounds is allowed. There is a $10 per night additional pet fee. They prefer that dogs are not left alone in the rooms, but if you must go for a short time, a contact number must be left with the front desk. Dogs must be leashed and cleaned up after.

COMMENTS: Conveniently just off I-75 all non-smoking and offering a free breakfast every day La Quinta Inn and Suites Port Charlotte is just the ticket for our guests on the go. This 81-room hotel on three floors offers free high-speed internet access and all rooms have a microwave refrigerator free local calling and a flat-panel HDTV with cable. The hotel provides a free expanded continental breakfast buffet and a business center. After a hard day of driving working or touring the area the fitness center and outdoor heated pool are just the thing to help you stay in shape and lose the stress. Parking is free and pets are welcome with certain restrictions. La Quinta Inn and Suites Port Charlotte is 10 minutes from Charlotte Harbor which offers deep-sea fishing a swimming complex restaurants and shops. Fishermen's Village offering more waterfront shops and dining is 20 minutes from the hotel. The Peace River offers kayaking through one of the area's beautiful natural waterways. Charlotte County Airport is 12 miles and Southwest Florida International Airport is 45 miles.<br><br>Dogs up to 50 pounds are allowed for a $50 refundable deposit; there is a pet policy to sign at check-in. Dogs may only be left alone in the room if they are left in the bathroom.

COMMENTS: The convenient location free breakfast heated outdoor pool and complimentary Wi-Fi are all features that our guests appreciate at the non-smoking La Quinta Inn & Suites Sarasota. The four-floor hotel has 102 rooms 12 of which are suites. All accommodations feature free Wi-Fi mini-fridges cable TVs coffeemakers desks with lamps complimentary newspapers and free local calls. Pet-friendly La Quinta has a heated outdoor pool a fitness center and a guest laundromat available for further convenience. In the morning guests can fuel up for the day with a complimentary continental breakfast. Parking is free. La Quinta Inn & Suites faces the Sarasota Bay and overlooks Long Boat Key. The hotel is one mile from Van Wezel Performing Arts Hall. Within three miles of the property guests will find the Ringling Museum of Art the Marie Selby Botanical Gardens and the Sarasota Opera House. Sarasota Bradenton International Airport is three miles away.<br><br>Dogs up to 30 pounds are allowed. There is a $10 per night per pet additional fee. Dogs are allowed in smoking rooms only. Dogs may not be left unattended, and they must be leashed and cleaned up after. Pets are allowed in smoking rooms only.

COMMENTS: Freebies like the hot buffet breakfast and Wi-Fi access and a location close to shopping and recreation draw our guests to La Quinta Inn & Suites St. Augustine.  The non-smoking La Quinta Inn & Suites sparkles with nice touches such as the fireside seating in both the lobby and the dining area. our guests appreciate the complimentary breakfast buffet which goes beyond the usual continental fare to offer hot-off-the-griddle waffles and other hearty options. Of course there's all the juice and coffee you can drink. Enjoy it all with a morning newspaper another freebie here. The 62 rooms spread over three floors have free Wi-Fi connections. All have TVs with cable channels as well as microwaves mini-fridges and coffeemakers. If you need to mix work and play the spacious desks have ample lighting and executive chairs. This is a pet-friendly lodging so you can reserve one  of the rooms set aside for travelers with furry friends. There's also a freeform outdoor pool and a fitness room with cardio and strength-training equipment. Parking is free. La Quinta Inn & Suites is west of downtown near I-95 so getting on the interstate is a cinch. If you're headed downtown Highway 16 gets you there in minutes. For example the Castillo de San Marcos is less than nine miles away. If you're here for the great shopping opportunities the hotel puts you within walking distance of St. Augustine Prime Outlet Mall. Jacksonville International Airport is 51 miles north.<br><br>Dogs up to 50 pounds are allowed for no additional fee; there is a pet policy to sign at check-in. Dogs may not be left alone in the room.

COMMENTS: Hooked on the free internet complimentary breakfast and reasonable price our guests also go for how easy the non-smoking La Quinta Inn & Suites St. Petersburg Northeast makes getting around town. All tastefully outfitted rooms feature luxe pillowtop mattresses microwaves and refrigerators cable TVs with HBO and free high-speed internet. Guests are amenable to the continental daily breakfast outdoor pool fitness room and business center. Parking is free. Pets are welcome for no additional fee.  Whether you're here to hunker down for work or explore all you can in the St. Pete/Tampa Bay area La Quinta Inn & Suites St Petersburg Northeast makes for a convenient jumping off point. You're a 10-minute drive to downtown St. Pete with attractions including the St. Pete Pier Holocaust Museum and the Salvador Dali Museum boasting the largest collection outside of Spain. If natural wonders are more your style Weedon Island Wildlife Refuge is equally close. Tropicana Field home of Tampa Bay Rays is within a 15-minute drive. Plus you're just a 15-minute hop over the Gandy Bridge into Tampa. You can be sunning it up on St. Pete Beach in only 25 minutes. This 59-room hotel on four floors offers wired and wireless internet access in all rooms along with cable TV microwaves and refrigerators and free local calling. Every morning the hotel offers a free breakfast buffet with hot and cold items. Weekdays guests get free newspapers as well. Business services such as copying are available for the road warrior and after a day of working or touring the fitness room and outdoor seasonal pool are just what you need to help you stay in shape and unwind. There's an on-site laundry facility and parking is free at this hotel. Pets are allowed with some restrictions. COMMENTS: There's free breakfast and Wi-Fi access at the non-smoking Baymont Inn and Suites Auburn a pet-friendly hotel. The three-story hotel offers free Wi-Fi in all 66 non-smoking rooms and a business center for any work tasks that pop up. There is a hot tub for soothing your muscles after a long day. The hotel also has a heated indoor pool. Guests wake to a free breakfast serving favorites like fresh fruit cereal and waffles. Pets are permitted and on-site parking is free. The hotel is off of I-69 close to many restaurants and fast-food spots. There is also a megastore on the same block. Car aficionados will want to check out the Auburn Cord Duesenberg Museum housed in the manufacturer's old factory with more than a hundred classic cars dating as far back as the 19th century; it's two miles from the hotel. It's an easy 20-minute drive to Fort Wayne Children's Zoo voted one of the country's best zoos and it's 30 miles to Fort Wayne International Airport.<br><br>Dogs of all sizes are allowed. There are no additional pet fees, however no discounts/coupons can be applied to the room. There is a pet waiver to sign at check in. Dogs must be leashed and cleaned up after.

COMMENTS: Free parking complimentary breakfast free Wi-Fi an excellent location and a helpful staff are a handful of reasons our guests praise La Quinta Inn and Suites Indianapolis Downtown. This three-floor pet-friendly hotel has 97 rooms. All of the non-smoking accommodations feature free Wi-Fi luxury bedding 32-inch LCD TVs and free newspapers. La Quinta Inn and Suites has a fitness center and a meeting room that can hold up to 20 people. Catering facilities are available upon request. In the morning guests can fuel up for the day with a complimentary hot breakfast. For those who rode into town on their own set of wheels parking is provided free of charge. La Quinta's central location is located less than a mile from Conseco Fieldhouse one mile from The Indiana State Museum and less than two miles from The Indianapolis Zoo and Lucas Oil Stadium. A handful of bistros restaurants and shopping malls are all under a mile from the hotel. Indiana International Airport is less than nine miles away.<br><br>Dogs of all sizes are allowed. Dogs may not be left alone in the room.

Guests wake to a free breakfast of waffles hot and cold cereal bread and muffins fresh fruit and all the coffee and juice they can drink. Just off I-70 and I-465 La Quinta Inn Indianapolis Airport Lynhurst is close to the action for sports fans visiting popular venues like Indianapolis Motor Speedway five miles away; Lucas Oil Stadium six miles; and Conseco Fieldhouse seven miles. COMMENTS: Free internet free continental breakfast and easy freeway access add up to extra value for our guests at La Quinta Inn Merrillville. Dust off your luggage and the kitty carrier before heading over to this pet-friendly hotel with two floors and 120 rooms. You can sleep serenely on a cushy mattress while flipping through premium channels on a flat-panel HDTV. Hook up your laptop to the plug-and-play console and then surf the web with Wi-Fi. Rooms include coffeemakers and alarm clock radios. Hungry guests can wash down muffins and pastries with hot coffee at the free continental breakfast. You can cannonball your way into the sparkling outdoor pool open seasonally for a big splash and then freshen up your bathing suit in the guest laundry. Local calls and parking are free. La Quinta Inn is less than a mile from I-65 and a 15-minute drive south of Gary Indiana. You can shop 'til you drop at Westfield Southlake Mall a large shopping complex just over a half-mile away. Satisfy your sweet tooth at the Albanese Confectionary Company just two-and-a-half miles from the hotel. COMMENTS: Free breakfast and internet near shopping dining and the interstate are reasons why La Quinta Inn And Suites Shreveport Airport is one of the most popular hotels in town among our guests.  With a Mediterranean roof and stylish lobby this four-story hotel??s 117 rooms feature free high-speed internet access flat-panel HDTVs with plug-in panel and complimentary local calls; some rooms offer a microwave and refrigerator. Rise and dine on the complimentary continental breakfast and make a splash in the outdoor pool and hot tub. Make it burn in the fitness center and then clean your clothes at the guest laundromat. Express checkout gives you more time to explore the city. Parking is free and pets stay free too. Near the junction of I-220 and I-20 La Quinta is three miles west of Shreveport Regional Airport. Walk five minutes to Westport Shopping Center or head two-and-a-half miles to practice your swing at Huntington Park Municipal Golf Course. Learn about local history at the Louisiana State Exhibit Museum six miles east or drive four miles to Splash Kingdom Water Town. Rent a boat five miles north at Cross Lake or smell the blooms at the American Rose Center four miles north. Downtown attractions including the Red River Entertainment District Sci-Port: Louisiana's Science Center and the riverboat casinos of Bossier City are 15 minutes east.<br><br>Dogs up to 100 pounds are allowed. There are no additional pet fees. Dogs must be leashed, cleaned up after, and a contact number must be left with the front desk if there is a pet in the room alone.

All 59 rooms at the three-story La Quinta include amenities like coffeemakers microwaves mini-fridges and free Wi-Fi. Start the day at the hotel's free breakfast buffet which features scrumptious items like breakfast sandwiches biscuits and gravy eggs waffles bagels fresh fruit coffee and juice. Bask in the warm Louisiana sun while lounging by or floating in the outdoor swimming pool. There's also a hot tub for relaxation. Work out on cardio equipment in the fitness room or freshen up your vacation wardrobe in the guest laundry. The on-site business center offers computer access plus copy and fax capabilities so you can check your email or print a boarding pass. Pets are welcome for a small fee. Parking is free.  La Quinta is one mile east of I-10 just north of U.S. 190 three-and-a-half miles from the heart of Slidell. Points of interest within a two-mile radius of the hotel include Midtown Square Shopping Center Ochsner Medical Center-North Shore Pope John II School and a Northrop Grumman office. New Orleans is a half-hour south of the hotel. Louis Armstrong New Orleans International Airport is 44 miles away.<br><br>Dogs of all sizes are allowed for no additional fee; there is a pet policy to sign at check in. It's also easy to get around with free parking and a complimentary shuttle to the airport. La Quinta Inn & Suites Portland is four miles from the airport and close to I-295. Union Station Shopping Plaza is a block away and several restaurants are within walking distance. The hotel is also less than two miles from the quaint shops and fresh seafood in the Old Port and a mile from the Portland Transportation Center where trains and buses depart. The civic center the Portland Museum of Art and the Institute of Contemporary Art are less than two miles away. Drive five miles south to reach the Portland Head Light the oldest lighthouse in Maine. <br><br>Quiet dogs of all sizes are allowed for no additional fee; there is a pet policy to sign at check-in.

Hot-off-the-griddle waffles are a hit at the free continental breakfast served every morning just off the lobby. The landscaped courtyard holds a pretty swimming pool and sunny terrace while indoors you'll find a fitness room with cardio and strength-training equipment. Free high-speed internet access is available in all 131 rooms so it's easy to keep in touch with friends and family. Accommodations also feature coffeemakers flat-panel cable TVs and plug-and-play technology for your digital devices. Some rooms also have microwaves and refrigerators. Parking is complimentary. COMMENTS: Free internet free breakfast and free parking plus state-of-the-art amenities and a great price await our guests at La Quinta Inn & Suites Bozeman. This 56-room all non-smoking hotel on three floors offers free high-speed internet flat-panel TVs microwaves refrigerators free local calling and free morning newspapers. The hotel provides a hot and cold expanded continental breakfast to get your day started and the business center provides copy print and fax services. After a day of touring skiing or working the indoor heated pool hot tub and fitness center are just where you want to be for relaxation and staying in shape. There's an on-site laundry facility. Parking is free and pets are allowed with some restrictions. The hotel is less than two miles from downtown Bozeman with its shops restaurants and modern western ambiance. The Museum of the Rockies is 10 minutes away as is Montana State University-Bozeman. Yellowstone National Park is less than 90 minutes from the hotel. Gallatin Field Airport is nine miles away.<br><br>Dogs of all sizes are allowed. Dogs may not be left alone in the room.

BUYCODE: 700208695
COMMENTS: Boasting a scenic river location rooms with free internet access and an indoor pool and hot tub La Quinta Inn & Suites Great Falls has your key to a comfortable stay in Big Sky Country. The three-story hotel provides 92 rooms with free internet access coffeemakers and hairdryers. You'll have a microwave to heat leftovers and quick-serve meals and flat-panel TVs with premium cable to enjoy while you unwind from your day. For serious relaxation consider a soak in the hot tub located beside the heated indoor pool. Come morning the complimentary breakfast buffet featuring items like waffles and a variety of hot and cold cereals will give you energy to get up and go. Additional amenities include fitness and business centers. The hotel offers complimentary airport shuttle service available Monday through Saturday from 6 a.m. to 3 p.m. and Sunday through Thursday from 7 p.m. to midnight. Pets are welcome for an additional fee. The hotel is located on the banks of the Missouri offering opportunities for walking or biking along the River's Edge Trail. It's two miles to the C.M. Russell Museum and Holiday Village Mall featuring over 80 retailers. The Lewis & Clark Interpretive Center and the Great Falls International Airport are five miles from La Quinta. It's six miles to Malmstrom Air Force Base.<br><br>Dogs of all sizes are allowed. There are no additional pet fees. There is a pet waiver to sign at check in. Dogs may not be left unattended, and they must be leashed and cleaned up after.

COMMENTS: Top-rated for its tasty free breakfast the non-smoking La Quinta Inn & Suites Helena knows that fresh-baked cookies and milk at bedtime provide a great way to win over almost any our guest. The three-story hotel provides 74 non-smoking rooms featuring plush bedding with pillowtop mattresses. But don't hunker down for the night before visiting the lobby for those fresh-from-the-oven cookies compliments of La Quinta. Get cozy in front of the 37-inch flat-panel TV and rev up the remote or opt for some web surfing with in-room Wi-Fi. Come morning head for the complimentary breakfast of scrambled eggs and bacon biscuits and gravy hot and cold cereal and more. If you live it up too much you can burn it off in the exercise room. There's a business center for folks who need some computer time and a coin laundry should that need arise. Pets are permitted with an additional fee. Just off I-15 La Quinta Inn is less than a mile from the state Capitol and less than two miles from the Holter Museum of Art Reeder's Alley and Carroll College. Canyon Ferry Lake and Gates of the Mountains are 18 miles away and it's 32 miles to the Great Divide Ski Area. Helena Regional Airport is three miles from the hotel; it's 85 miles from Great Falls International Airport.<br><br>Dogs of all sizes are allowed. Dogs may not be left alone in the room.

COMMENTS: Offering free Wi-Fi complimentary breakfast and sumptuous beds the non-smoking La Quinta Inn & Suites Kalispell is one of the most popular hotels in the area among our guests. Equipped with the stuff dreams are made of the 71 rooms at this three-floor modern-rustic lodge are outfitted with top-of-the-line Euro-top mattresses wrapped in crisp white linens. Other in-room comforts include free Wi-Fi premium cable TV mini-fridges and microwaves. How sweet it is that guests start their day with a complimentary breakfast buffet and end it with freshly baked complimentary cookies. Whether up for a dip or a cardio spin guests have access to an indoor pool hot tub and fitness room 24 hours a day. Pets are welcome and parking is free. Right off Highway 2 the hotel puts guests as close as a five-minute walk to retail stores restaurant chains and casino action. For slower-paced charm historic downtown Kalispell ?? an ideal spot for antiquing and mom-and-pop shop shopping ?? is a one-mile drive. Those anxious to break out the clubs fear not: the area's many courses include Buffalo Hill Golf Club three miles away. Boaters hikers and anglers looking for a reel good time should head for Flathead Lake a 25-minute scenic ride. Glacier Park International Airport is seven miles from the hotel.<br><br>Dogs of all sizes are allowed. There are no additional pet fees. Dogs must be well behaved, leashed, and cleaned up after.

COMMENTS: Free breakfast an indoor pool free Wi-Fi and a pet-friendly policy are favorite perks at the completely non-smoking La Quinta Inn Missoula. This hotel has 80 rooms spread over three floors. All rooms feature microwaves refrigerators coffeemakers and TVs with premium cable channels. Begin your day with La Quinta's free Bright Side Breakfast and enjoy fresh hot coffee and waffles or other goodies with your complimentary newspaper. The hotel also offers an indoor pool and hot tub free Wi-Fi a business center and a guest laundromat. On-site parking is free for guests and pets are welcome.  La Quinta Inn is right off of I-90 near a string of restaurants and bars. Downtown Missoula the Carousel for Missoula and the Missoula Art Museum are within four miles. Pay a visit to the Smokejumper Visitor Center three miles away to learn about fighting forest fires and to the Historical Museum at Fort Missoula five miles away to explore the city's Old West past. The University of Montana and Southgate Mall are also five miles from the hotel. Silvertip Casino is 12 minutes away and Missoula International Airport is a three-mile drive.<br><br>Quiet dogs of all sizes are allowed for no additional fee; there is a pet policy to sign at check-in. A contact number must be left with the front desk if there is a pet in the room alone.

COMMENTS: With comfy Tempur-Pedic beds free internet and an indoor pool the pet-friendly La Quinta Inn & Suites Boone is a local favorite of our guests. This three-floor 77-room hotel boasts impressive curb appeal that blends beautifully with its rustic setting. Natural shingles and stonework accents drive home that mountain-lodge feeling. Those obsessed with a great night's sleep can put Tempur-Pedic DreamSpa mattresses to the test. Dressed in soft creams and a bit of French country chic flair the smoking and non-smoking rooms include free high-speed internet microwaves and mini-fridges. Taking center stage are an upscale rustic lobby with floor-to-ceiling stone fireplace and an indoor pool. Guests can also feast a free breakfast with waffles and more and work off excess calories in the exercise room. Parking is free. Pets are welcome. Less than a mile from Appalachian State University the hotel's location fits the bill for those with business at Samaritan's Purse or IRC both within two miles. Those tempted by the local shopping scene are within a mile of Boone Mall and a 15-minute drive to Tanger Outlets. Those looking to cruise the slopes or the scenic roadways are as close as five miles to Appalachian Ski Mountain and a 15-minute ride to the Blue Ridge Parkway. It's 95 miles to Charlotte/Douglas International Airport.<br><br>Dogs of all sizes are allowed for no additional fee; there is a pet policy to sign at check-in. Dogs may not be left alone in the room.

COMMENTS: Save money with free breakfast Wi-Fi and parking at La Quinta Inn Raleigh Cary which also offers well-equipped rooms and a pool. You and a four-legged friend can check into this pet-friendly hotel with five floors and 128 rooms (non-smoking available). Kick back on a cozy bed and turn on the flat-panel HDTV for in-room entertainment. You can power up your laptop and surf the web with free Wi-Fi. Rooms also include coffeemakers microwaves and mini-fridges. Hungry guests can wolf down warm muffins doughnuts and bagels at the free continental breakfast. Go for a dip in the outdoor pool or a soothing soak in the hot tub. Crunch your abs in the fitness center or crunch some numbers in the business center. Freshen up your outfit in the guest laundry. Local calls and parking are free. La Quinta Inn is one mile from Pope Memorial Highway (U.S. 1) and four miles from I-40 which provides easy free access across the region. You'll get a kick out of watching professional soccer at WakeMed Soccer Park home of the Carolina RailHawks just a 14-minute drive. Nature lovers can hike the trails at Hemlock Bluff Nature Preserve one-and-a-half miles from the hotel. Catch a concert at the Koka Booth Amphitheatre two miles away. The hotel is 15 miles from Raleigh-Durham International Airport.<br><br>Dogs of all sizes are allowed. There are no additional pet fees. COMMENTS: Our guests can have three for free at the non-smoking La Quinta Inn & Suites Bismarck with complimentary Wi-Fi parking and continental breakfast. Afterwards everyone can unwind in the indoor pool or catch up on the day's events with a free newspaper. There is also a guest laundry. Parking is complimentary. The hotel is 100 percent non-smoking. Start your day with the hotel's free Bright Side Breakfast? with waffles and other hot items accompanied by a complimentary newspaper. The complimentary breakfast includes thick Belgian waffles cereal pastries fruit juice coffee and more. The indoor pool and hot tub are perfect for a year-round wind down no matter the weather. The hotel is approximately two miles from the Garden State Parkway and 14 minutes from downtown Newark. New York City's many attractions are a 22-minute trip away via the Lincoln Tunnel. On the New Jersey side catch a Giants or Jets game or a live concert at MetLife Stadium at the Meadowlands Sports Complex five miles away. Newark Liberty International Airport is a 13-mile drive from the hotel.<br><br>Dogs of all sizes are allowed. There is a $10 per night per pet additional fee. Dogs may not be left unattended, and they must be leashed and cleaned up after.

This low-rise hotel offers 58 guestrooms with free high-speed internet access triple-sheeted beds microwaves mini-fridges coffeemakers hairdryers and cable TV. The day starts with fresh hot waffles at breakfast. There is an on-site fitness center and in the summer the outdoor pool and hot tub are the places to relax. Business services and a guest laundry are available. Pets are welcome (fee) and parking is free. Local vintages can be sampled at Luna Rosa Winery six miles away. The historic downtown with the Old Customs House and the Deming Luna Mimbres Museum is two miles away. Hop on I-10 a block away and find yourself in Tucson Arizona in three hours or in Las Cruces in an hour. El Paso International Airport is 106 miles away.<br><br>Dogs of all sizes are allowed. There are no additional pet fees. Dogs must be leashed and cleaned up after.

COMMENTS: Welcoming you with free breakfast free high-speed Internet access free parking and complimentary shuttle service the pet friendly La Quinta Inn & Suites Las Vegas Airport South is so comfortable and accommodating you'll feel like a first class traveler who got away with paying coach. Located adjacent to McCarran International Airport La Quinta Inn & Suites Las Vegas Airport South offers free airport shuttle service around the clock.  Whether your flight is scheduled for morning afternoon or night you'll rest easy knowing the hotel's friendly shuttle will get you there on time. If you do have the opportunity to catch breakfast before your flight the hotel's free  Bright Side Breakfast is surely worth the time. You'll enjoy hot waffles fresh fruit eggs cereals and coffee which is more than we can say for most in-flight services these days. Highspeed Internet access is also free so checking in for your flight from the comfort of your hotel room is not a problem. Each of the hotel's 140 guestrooms has a microwave and refrigerator. Some rooms also come with whirlpool tubs. Rounding out the hotel's list of amenities is an outdoor swimming pool and guest laundry facilities. If you enjoy traveling with your pooch the hotel has a friendly pet policy that makes it possible. Although The Strip is just a few miles north of the hotel there are also a ton of casual nicely-priced restaurants nearby if you want to grab a quick bite post flight. The Las Vegas Outlets are located just a few minutes south of the hotel and if you're in the mood for a milk chocolate treat Ethel M's Chocolate Factory is just three miles away.<br><br>Dogs of all sizes are allowed. COMMENTS: Generously appointed with free amenities including breakfast Wi-Fi and parking the non-smoking La Quinta Inn and Suites Las Vegas Red Rock/Summerlin is a perfect option for both your wallet and your well being. La Quinta Inn and Suites provides comfy beds and friendly service. Guests will also find themselves surrounded by endless acres of gorgeous landscape in the form of Red Rock Canyon National Conservation Area. Start your day with a nearby hike or simply dream about it as you sip your morning coffee and enjoy the complimentary Bright Side Breakfast. After breakfast feel free to check your email via the free high-speed internet or duck into the 24-hour business center and hop on one of the computer stations. There is also a 24-hour heated outdoor pool and hot tub which are open year-round and a fitness center. Even better all of the 75 accommodations are non-smoking and feature kitchenettes with microwaves refrigerators coffeemakers cookware and dishes so saving money on snacks or meals is easy as pressing ''start.'' Rooms are also equipped with work desks and plenty of space for relaxing in front of the TV. Pets are welcome and parking is on the house. La Quinta Inn and Suites is located within driving distance of many family-friendly restaurants including an International House of Pancakes Chicago Brewery Company and P.F. Chang's. An 18-screen movie theater is also located just minutes away. If golf is your sport of choice the area offers ample opportunities to improve your swing. COMMENTS: Internet access and breakfast are free at the La Quinta Inn & Suites Brooklyn Downtown.  Opened in 2010 the six-story La Quinta Inn has a fresh modern feel. COMMENTS: Complimentary Wi-Fi waffle breakfast and parking plus an indoor pool lounge and a location that's a short commute into the Big Apple await our guests at the pet-friendly La Quinta Inn & Suites Elmsford. COMMENTS: With an indoor pool complimentary breakfast and rooms with free Wi-Fi La Quinta Inn & Suites Plattsburgh offers convenient amenities at a rate that makes our guests happy. The mid-rise La Quinta Inn & Suites offers 103 rooms with free Wi-Fi coffeemakers alarm clocks and beds with pillowtop mattresses. The flat-panel HDTVs have enough plug-ins to connect all your gadgets. Start your day with hot waffles fresh fruit cereal pastries and more at the complimentary breakfast. The indoor pool and hot tub provide year-round liquid relaxation. A guest laundry and copy and fax services are available on-site. Parking is free. Pets are welcome. La Quinta Inn & Suites Plattsburgh is located off I-87 two miles from downtown Plattsburgh Champlain Valley Physicians Hospital and SUNY Plattsburgh. There are several restaurants within walking distance. Shoppers can fill their bags at the Champlain Centre a half-mile away. Enjoy a picnic along the shores of Lake Champlain at Cumberland Bay State Park six miles away. The hotel is 15 miles from the Ausable Chasm a stunning sandstone canyon often referred to as the ''Grand Canyon of the East.'' The hotel is five miles from Plattsburgh International Airport.<br><br>Dogs of all sizes are allowed. There are no additional fees. There is a pet waiver to sign at check in. COMMENTS: Our guests appreciate the free Wi-Fi breakfast and parking and the convenient location of the pet-friendly La Quinta Inn Cleveland - Airport North. The four-story hotel has 115 rooms equipped with free Wi-Fi and local calls coffeemakers and cable TVs with premium channels and pay movies. The free breakfast is served in the lobby and offers an array of treats including waffles pastries cereals breads fresh fruit and beverages. Don't skip your workout: The hotel has a fitness room with cardio equipment. There are coin-operated laundry facilities as well as fax and copy services at the front desk. The hotel offers shuttle service to the airport from 4:30AM-Midnight. Parking is free.  This La Quinta is within four miles of the Cleveland Hopkins International Airport. Situated across the street from the city's RTA public transit stop guests reach downtown Cleveland within a 40-minute ride and can catch a ballgame at Progressive Field or take in a show in the city center's theater district. Business guests are within a 10-minute drive to NASA Glenn Research Center and Sysco Foods. If golf is your game Mastick Little Met and Big Met golf courses are all within a 10-minute drive west. <br><br>Dogs of all sizes are allowed. There are no additional fees. Dogs may not be left unattended, except for short periods, and a cell number must be left with the front desk. Dogs must be leashed, and removed or crated for housekeeping.

COMMENTS: Free Wi-Fi rooms with microwaves and refrigerators and a complimentary breakfast buffet are just a few of the popular amenities our guests get at the pet-friendly La Quinta Inn & Suites Columbus West - Hilliard. Each of the 60 rooms of the three-story hotel is furnished with a flat panel TV free Wi-Fi a microwave and a mini-fridge which come in handy for keeping drinks cool and leftovers hot. All accommodations have sofas and some come with sofa beds. The indoor pool provides year-round relaxation. Complimentary breakfast includes waffles coffee juices tea and hot chocolate pastries cereal bread biscuits fresh fruit yogurt and more. Pets are allowed and parking is free. La Quinta Inn & Suites Columbus West - Hilliard is located off of I-70 for easy highway access. There are several restaurants within walking distance. The hotel is adjacent to a Walmart Supercenter and a movie theater. Families who want to monkey around can reach the Columbus Zoo in 15 minutes. Ohio State University is eight miles from the hotel. It is a 10-mile drive to downtown Columbus. Port Columbus International Airport is about 15 miles away.<br><br>Dogs of all sizes are allowed. Dogs may not be left alone in the room.

COMMENTS: Free internet access and breakfast help put La Quinta Inn Grove City on our guests' list of top area hotels. The non-smoking La Quinta Inn Grove City has three floors and all 84 rooms offer free high-speed internet access as well as rooms with cable TV free local calling and comfortable beds. The free expanded continental breakfast will get your motor started and the hotel's 24-hour front desk can help you with any business needs while you're on the road. The indoor heated pool and the fitness room are just the places to de-stress after a day of driving working or touring the area. There's even an on-site laundry facility which can come in mighty handy when you're on the road. Pets are welcome with some restrictions and parking is free. La Quinta Inn is convenient to I-71 and I-270 15 minutes from downtown Columbus and 16 miles from Port Columbus International Airport. The Ohio State University campus is a 20-minute drive from the hotel. Several casual restaurants and two golf courses are within two miles of the hotel.<br><br>Dogs of all sizes are allowed. There is a $25 refundable pet deposit if paying by cash. There is a pet policy to sign at check in. Dogs may not be left unattended, and they must be leashed and cleaned up after. They are not allowed in the food or pool areas.
