COMMENTS: Pillowtop mattresses a waffle breakfast and free Wi-Fi are perks that please our guests at La Quinta Inn Cleveland Independence which offers easy interstate access and a location 15 minutes from downtown. The three-story La Quinta Inn offers 100 rooms packed with amenities such as free Wi-Fi flat-panel TVs with cable plug-and-play consoles for electronic gadgets pillowtop mattresses coffeemakers irons and hairdryers. Guests can take advantage of the free continental breakfast which includes items such as make-your-own waffles hot and cold cereals bread muffins fruit coffee and juice. A meeting room is available for business or social events. Pets are welcome. La Quinta Inn is near the junction of I-77 and I-480 in Independence within a mile of the Cleveland Clinic the Cuyahoga Valley Scenic Railroad and numerous shops and restaurants. The Cleveland Zoo is 10 minutes away and downtown Cleveland landmarks such as the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame the Cleveland Convention Center and Cleveland Indians Stadium are 15 minutes from the hotel. Cuyahoga Valley National Park and Geauga Lake's Wildwater Kingdom water park are 25 minutes away. Cleveland-Hopkins International Airport is 12 miles away.<br><br>Dogs up to 50 pounds are allowed. There are no additional pet fees, but you must declare your pets at check in. They prefer that dogs are not left alone in the rooms, but if you must go out for a short time, they must be crated and the front desk informed. Dogs must be leashed and cleaned up after.

COMMENTS: Offering free breakfast and Wi-Fi and year-round swimming the non-smoking La Quinta Inn & Suites Cincinnati NE - Mason is a satisfying economy option for a business or family stay. This La Quinta Inn & Suites is a mid-rise hotel boasting pillowtop beds hairdryers coffeemakers flat-panel HDTVs with game consoles and plug-and-play features and free Wi-Fi in all 90 non-smoking rooms. Guests start the day with a free newspaper and a buffet of waffles muffins cereal and more before heading off to meetings or to the Kings Island Amusement Park. The atrium hosts a heated indoor pool and a hot tub make kicking back a breeze. The hotel also offers self-service laundry facilities and free parking. Pets are welcome at no extra cost. The La Quinta Inn & Suites is loff I-71 in Mason 19 miles north of downtown Cincinnati and 11 minutes from the Kings Island Amusement Park which features the Nickelodeon Universe and the 45-hole Jack Nicklaus Golf Center. Abundant shopping dining and entertainment options are offered at the Deerfield Towne Center about four minutes from the property. The University of Cincinnati is 24 minutes away and the hotel is 33 miles from Cincinnati-Northern Kentucky International Airport.<br><br>Dogs of all sizes are allowed. COMMENTS: Piping hot waffles are the star of the complimentary breakfast buffet at the newly opened La Quinta Inn & Suites Elk City where our guests also have free internet access local calls and private parking.  Built in 2012 the three-story La Quinta Inn & Suites shines. Decorated in neutral tones with bright splashes of color the 71 rooms and suites treat you to pillowtop beds covered with silky soft linens flat-panel TVs with premium cable channels and free wired and wireless internet access and local calls. Microwaves refrigerators and coffeemakers are among the homey touches. Well-lit desks with executive chairs are perfect for when you have to finish some last-minute paperwork. Bathrooms have hairdryers and massaging showerheads. Pets are allowed. Work out with the free weights and cardio machines in the mirror-walled fitness room or take a dip in the seasonal outdoor pool. A complimentary continental breakfast including freshly baked waffles is served every morning and free coffee is always available in the lobby. There's also a convenience store for all the things you might have left behind. A laundry room comes in handy for on-the-go travelers. Parking is complimentary. Located on Route 66 La Quinta Inn & Suites puts you within a few miles of downtown Elk City and the National Route 66 Museum. Local attractions like the Centennial Carousel at Ackley Park the Beutler Brothers Rodeo Arena and the Elk City are all within about three miles of the hotel. Nearby I-40 takes you to Oklahoma City or Tulsa. Will Rogers World Airport is 108 miles east and Lawton-Fort Sill Regional Airport is 110 miles southeast of the property.<br><br>Dogs of all sizes are allowed. Dogs may not be left alone in the room.

COMMENTS: Rooms include microwaves mini-fridges and free Wi-Fi at the non-smoking La Quinta Inn & Suites Oklahoma City - Moore. This four-story hotel has 63 non-smoking rooms with free high-speed internet access microwaves and mini-fridges. The free breakfast is a nice way to start the day and features waffles cereal fruit and more. The hotel has a fitness center for active guests an indoor pool and hot tub for relaxation plus a coin laundry. Pets are welcome. A business center keeps guests wired in to work duties. Parking is free. Located off I-35 the hotel is eight miles south of downtown Oklahoma City and within a mile of several shops and restaurants. Root for the Oklahoma City RedHawks at AT&T Bricktown Ballpark 12 miles away. The National Cowboy & Western Heritage Museum is 13 miles from the property. It's 14 miles to Will Rogers World Airport.<br><br>Dogs of all sizes are allowed for no additional fee; there is a pet policy to sign at check-in. A contact number needs to be left with the front desk if there is a dog alone in the room.

COMMENTS: Complimentary breakfast and Wi-Fi a pool and a location near golf and medical facilities draw our guests to the non-smoking La Quinta Inn & Suites Oklahoma City North West Expressway. Guests at the six-story La Quinta enjoy free high-speed internet access coffeemakers and cable TVs in its 125 non-smoking rooms. Select accommodations also include mini-fridges and microwaves. Mornings begin with complimentary breakfast featuring biscuits and gravy waffles and unlimited coffee. Microwaves mini-fridges and coffeemakers come standard in this four-story hotel's 77 rooms as do free Wi-Fi access and premium cable TV programming. Relax by the indoor heated pool and hot tub after digging into the free hot breakfast that includes eggs waffles sausages and more. Microwaves mini-fridges and coffeemakers add the comforts of home along with premium cable TVs. The complimentary continental breakfast served every morning in the cheerful dining area includes golden-brown waffles and other hot options and you can enjoy a free newspaper with your meal. Parking is free and pets are welcome. La Quinta Inn & Suites is walking distance to a variety of factory outlet stores at Rockvale Outlet Lancaster. American Music Theatre one of the area's top performing-arts centers is one mile away. Central Pennsylvania College is four miles and it's an eight-mile drive to the Lancaster County Convention Center. Harrisburg International Airport is a 38-mile trip and Philadelphia International Airport is 56 miles from the hotel.<br><br>Dogs of all sizes are allowed. Dogs may not be left alone in the room.

STATE: TN
LAT: 
BUYCODE: 700112383
COMMENTS: Rooms with microwaves and mini-fridges plus free breakfast free Wi-Fi and free parking are a few of the amenities our guests dig at non-smoking La Quinta Inn & Suites Cookeville. All 66 rooms in the three-story La Quinta have coffeemakers flat-panel cable TVs DVD players microwaves mini-fridges and free Wi-Fi. Start the day with the hotel's free Bright Side breakfast spread featuring waffles bacon sausage eggs bagels pastries yogurt fruit and drinks. Burn a few calories on the fitness center's cardio equipment or go for a dip in the seasonal heated outdoor pool and hot tub. There's free coffee in the lobby 24 hours a day and the hotel offers valet laundry and dry cleaning service. Parking is free and pets are welcome. Located off I-40 midway between Nashville and Knoxville La Quinta Inn and Suites is three miles from Tennessee Tech University. Guests are also within three miles of Cookeville Golf Club and Cane Creek Park. Burgess Falls State Park nearly nine miles from the hotel is home to waterfalls and hiking trails. Nashville International Airport is 73 miles away.<br><br>Dogs of all sizes are allowed. Dogs may not be left alone in the room.

COMMENTS: Complimentary continental breakfast is one of the perks at the non-smoking La Quinta Inn & Suites Goodlettsville located just minutes from Nashville. The three-story non-smoking hotel offers 121 rooms with available Wi-Fi and coffeemakers so you can stay caffeinated and connected in the comfort of your room. Relax in front of the 32-inch cable TV before you drift off to sleep. Each morning's continental breakfast is free. Active guests work up a sweat in the on-site fitness room and enjoy free access to a nearby gym. The 24-hour business center offers copy fax and printing services. Parking is free. La Quinta is off I-65 15 miles north of Nashville. You'll find a wide variety of dining options within a half-mile of the hotel. Shoppers fill their bags at Rivergate Mall one-and-a-half miles away. Country music fans make time for shows at the Grand Ole Opry and tours of the Country Music Hall of Fame; both attractions are less than 15 minutes away. Historians tour the Hermitage the home of Andrew Jackson 13 miles away. The hotel is 20 miles from Nashville International Airport.<br><br>Dogs of all sizes are allowed. Dogs may not be left alone in the room.

COMMENTS: Free high-speed internet and local calls a convenient location and an attractive Southwest flair please our guests at La Quinta Inn & Suites Jackson. Spread over three interior-corridor floors this property's 100 rooms include free high-speed internet access cable TV and local calls. Guests receive a complimentary newspaper and a free breakfast buffet each morning. Business services including faxing and copying are available at the 24-hour front desk. In addition to and on-site seasonal outdoor pool the hotel provides free passes to a nearby gym for the dedicated fitness enthusiast. Parking is free and the hotel is pet-friendly.  La Quinta Inn & Suites Jackson is four miles north of downtown Jackson.  The Casey Jones Home and Railroad Museum and the International Rockabilly Hall of Fame Museum are less than 10 minutes away. It's about six miles to McKellar Sipes Regional Airport. Memphis International Airport is about 80 miles away.<br><br>Dogs of all sizes are allowed. There are no additional fees. Dogs may not be left unattended, and they must be leashed and cleaned up after.

COMMENTS: Hi-tech amenities free breakfast and a complimentary airport shuttle make for a hassle-free stay in the Tri-Cities at La Quinta Inn & Suites Kingsport Tricities Airport. All 118 rooms in this five-story hotel offer free high-speed internet flat-panel HDTVs with plug-in panel and coffee makers. Belly up to the free continental breakfast each morning for piping hot waffles. Stay on your training schedule in the fitness room and treat the business center like your office while you're on the road. Goof off in the outdoor pool and keep your duds clean in the guest laundry. Hop on the free shuttle from the airport or park free on site. Pets are welcome. Just off I-81 La Quinta Inn & Suites is four miles from a day of hiking or boating in Warriors' Path State Park and three miles from some retail therapy at the Factory Stores of America at Tri-Cities. Cruise 20 minutes east to explore Appalachian Caverns and 25 minutes to exercise your lead foot at Bristol Motor Speedway. You're 20 minutes from the golf course at MeadowView Conference Center or the pioneer exhibits at Exchange Place. Drive 30 minutes south to attractions in Johnson City including Millennium Center the Tipton-Haynes Historic Site and the Hands On! Regional Museum. The hotel is two-and-a-half miles from Tri-Cities Regional Airport.<br><br>Dogs of all sizes are allowed. There are no additional pet fees. Dogs may not be left unattended, and they must be leashed and cleaned up after.

COMMENTS: Well-appointed rooms with microwaves and mini-fridges are just some of the conveniences at the non-smoking La Quinta Inn and Suites Knoxville Central Papermill which has a pool and offers breakfast and Wi-Fi for free. Built in 2014 this four-story non-smoking hotel has 96 rooms equipped with free Wi-Fi flat-panel TVs and coffeemakers; stock your mini-fridge with goodies from the on-site sundry shop to heat up in your microwave. The hotel offers a free breakfast bar each day with waffles and other hot items like eggs and sausage. Cool off in the seasonal outdoor pool or get your heartrate going on a treadmill or resistance machine in the fitness center. A coin laundry and free parking are other perks. Some pets can stay for free. The hotel is just off Papermill Road and I-40/75 less than six miles west of downtown Knoxville with its World's Fair Sunsphere and the Knoxville Museum of Art and 10 miles west of Knoxville Zoological Gardens which has a cute red panda exhibit. Catch a University of Tennessee Volunteers football game at Neyland Stadium just more then 10 minutes away by car; the hotel can coordinate a game-day shuttle too for a fee. McGhee-Tyson Airport is 16 miles south.<br><br>Dogs of all sizes are allowed. Dogs may not be left alone in the room.

COMMENTS: Outdoor swimming and free breakfast plus video games come together at La Quinta Inn Knoxville West near I-40/75 and West Town Mall in suburban Knoxville. All 130 rooms at the three-story hotel feature flat-panel HDTVs that have premium channels video games and multi-plug features as well as coffeemakers and hairdryers. The hotel is off I-40/75 15 minutes west of downtown Knoxville attractions such as the University of Tennessee and Knoxville Convention Center. Kids of all ages make discoveries at the Knoxville Zoo 15 miles northeast. Shoppers delight in retail options five minutes away at West Town Mall. Media makers and shakers are less than two miles from Scripps Networks. A 14-mile drive leads to McGhee Tyson Airport. <br><br>Dogs of all sizes are allowed. Dogs may not be left alone in the room.

Start your day with the free continental breakfast of waffles hot and cold cereal breads muffins pastries fresh fruit coffee tea milk and juice. The hotel also has a seasonal outdoor pool and free parking.  La Quinta Inn is off I-20 just four miles north of downtown Abilene and its attractions like Paramount Theatre and Frontier Texas. Abilene Christian University is two miles south and Abilene Zoo is five miles south. If you're driving from Abilene Regional Airport the hotel is seven miles north. <br><br>Dogs of all sizes are allowed. There are no additional pet fees. Although there is no set allotment for dogs, their preference is for no more than 2 large dogs or 3 small dogs per room. Dogs must be removed for housekeeping. Dogs may not be left unattended, and they must be leashed and cleaned up after.

COMMENTS: An outdoor pool free Wi-Fi breakfast and parking a fireplace and friendly service in Round Rock top the list of comforting amenities at the non-smoking La Quinta Inn and Suites Round Rock South. The coziness of the four-story La Quinta Inn and Suites begins with the lobby fireplace and continues in the hotel's 87 rooms all featuring free Wi-Fi and local calls pillowtop mattresses desks and flat-panel TVs with premium channels and video games. Guests can relax in the year-round outdoor pool and hot tub and stay fit in the exercise room. Breakfast is free and includes waffles eggs cereals bread pastries yogurt fresh fruit and beverages. The hotel also has guest laundry facilities and pets are welcome for no extra charge.  Located off I-35 on the southern tip of Round Rock and north of Well's Branch 17 miles north of downtown Austin the La Quinta Inn & Suites offers free parking for both large and small vehicles. Business guests can jot off to Dell Inc. one mile north and Hewlett Packard within a 10-minute drive south. Head up I-35 for popular restaurants and discount shopping or fly off to Austin-Bergstrom International Airport 21 miles south.<br><br>Dogs of all sizes are allowed. There are no additional pet fees. Dogs must be leashed, cleaned up after, and a contact number left with the front desk if there is a pet alone in the room.

COMMENTS: Breakfast and Wi-Fi are free and an outdoor pool awaits in a great location at the non-smoking La Quinta Inn Austin Capitol/Downtown.  The four floors of this La Quinta Inn house 152 non-smoking rooms all with free Wi-Fi cable TV with premium channels and coffeemakers. Guests can fuel up on the daily free breakfast that includes waffles fresh fruit cereals yogurt breads pastries and beverages. When you're not running around the city the 24-hour fitness center is at your service with cardio and weight equipment and the year-round outdoor pool makes for a refreshing splash after an exciting Austin day. Valet parking only is available for an extra charge. The hotel is right next to the Texas State Capitol in downtown Austin three blocks from I-35 and four streets from the southern tip of the University of Texas campus. Capital Metro buses run just outside of the hotel and valet parking is available for a fee. Everything from art museums to theatres to rowdy live music venues are within a 10-minute walk from the hotel and the Austin-Bergstrom International Airport is just a seven-mile drive east. <br><br>Dogs of all sizes are allowed. COMMENTS: The friendly service only enhances the free breakfast Wi-Fi and parking and super convenient central location of La Quinta Inn Oltorf Austin. Guests wake up to a free daily breakfast with boiled eggs pastries waffles cereals breads fresh fruit and an assortment of beverages. There's also a year-round outdoor pool for cooling off on spicy days. Providing free parking and situated along East Oltorf Street at I-35 this La Quinta is a stellar location in the heart of South Austin. St. Edward's University and the lush nature preserve of Blunn Creek are both less than a five-minute drive away and Roy G. Guerrero Park housing both Riverside Golf Course and the Colorado River Wildlife Sanctuary is just five minutes northeast along Lady Bird Lake. Guests will love the speedy 10-minute drive to Zilker Park complete with the Botanical Garden and Barton Springs Pool; and passing by the hip cafs and second-hand shops along South Congress Avenue in Travis Heights will lead them to the sights sounds and flavors of downtown Austin fewer than three miles north. When flying out early risers have the added convenience of the Austin-Bergstrom International Airport being just a six-mile drive east.<br><br>Dogs up to 50 pounds are allowed. COMMENTS: Free Wi-Fi and a complimentary breakfast aren't the only pluses at La Quinta and Suites Bay City. Modern flair non-smoking rooms and pet acceptance make value stays much more pleasant. This three-floor hotel is home to 76 contemporary rooms dressed in soothing earth tones and sumptuous fabrics and textiles. Sexy flat-panel TVs complement the sleek clean-lined furnishings. Must-haves include free high-speed internet mini-fridges and microwaves. For those who need more space suites include additional living areas and sofa beds. Workout fanatics probably can't resist the fitness room with cardio and weight resistance machines. Easing those tired muscles is easy at the outdoor swimming pool and hot tub. Come morning folks can make their way to the free breakfast buffet with waffles muffins pastries fresh fruit and more. Features including a business center and pet acceptance take a major load off for many guests. Parking is free. COMMENTS: Access to a private lake a saltwater pool and a hot tub with a waterfall attract our guests to the non-smoking La Quinta Inn & Suites Bridge City. All 62 rooms at the non-smoking three-story La Quinta offer free Wi-Fi 42-inch flat panel cable TVs air conditioning microwaves refrigerators coffeemakers and free local calls. Mornings here start with a complimentary breakfast that features hot and cold items. Corporate guests take advantage of the business center while leisure guests make time for swims in the private lake outdoor saltwater pool and saltwater hot tub which comes complete with a waterfall. There's also a small fitness room on-site. If angling is your thing feel free to borrow fishing gear from the front desk. Pets are permitted. Parking is complimentary. La Quinta is in downtown Bridge City within a half-mile of several local restaurants. Bridge City Historical Museum is two miles away. The property is six miles from the Neches River and 25 miles from Sabine Lake. The Shangri La Botanical Gardens and Nature Center and the Stark Museum of Art are both a nine-mile drive. Patch Golf Club is 10 miles away. Southeast Texas Regional Airport is 16 miles from the property and Lake Charles Regional Airport is 51 miles away.<br><br>Dogs of all sizes are allowed. Dogs may not be left alone in the room.

COMMENTS: Offering free breakfast free Wi-Fi and a seasonal outdoor pool and hot tub the pet-accommodating La Quinta Inn & Suites Decatur is a convenient suburban option for a stay near the Dallas/Fort Worth Metroplex. The low-rise La Quinta has 71 rooms and suites all boasting upscale amenities including pillowtop beds microwaves mini-fridges and flat-panel TVs with premium cable channels. Hairdryers irons with ironing boards and coffeemakers are also standard. Non-smoking rooms can be requested and pets are welcome for an additional fee. Wi-Fi and wired internet access are both free. Start the day with a smile thanks to the free newspaper and breakfast buffet including eggs bacon sausage and waffles. Use the well-equipped business center for web surfing or fax and copy services then take a dip in the pool or pump some iron in the fitness room. La Quinta also provides guest laundry facilities and free parking. La Quinta is on Highway 287 two miles south of Decatur's historic downtown district and about 45 minutes from Fort Worth. The Wise Regional Health System and Decatur College are both less than a mile away. Guests are a mile from the Petrified Wood Station an unusual gas station and cafe that has been a Decatur landmark since the 1930s. There are also hiking and biking trails that meander through the Lyndon B. Johnson National Grasslands less than 30 minutes away. COMMENTS: Scoring free internet and complimentary breakfasts our guests also land clean contemporary style at the non-smoking La Quinta Inn & Suites Ennis. This three-floor hotel ?? where pets are accepted ?? offers 67 rooms as stylish as they are comfortable. Decked out with sleek clean-lined furniture and nifty neutral palettes value-rate rooms have a crisp upscale look. Comforts include recliners pillowtop mattresses and microwaves and mini-fridges for one and all. Flat-panel LCD TVs with HBO and free high-speed internet are standard perks. Options include studio suites with separate living areas. No wimpy breakfast the free morning buffet includes waffles cheese omelets pastries biscuits and gravy and more. Along with a mighty-handy business center the hotel helps guests beat the heat and work up a sweat with an outdoor pool hot tub and fitness room. Parking is free. One block off I-45 the hotel is within a one-mile drive to charming downtown Ennis ?? home to a treasured district on the National Registry of Historic Places that's lined with red brick streets antique stores and Czech influences. Anglers might be lured with a visit to Lake Bardwell a 15-minute drive where the largemouth bass are jumping. Those up for a slice of Americana are four miles to Galaxy Drive-In the last of a dying breed. Dallas Love Field Airport is 40 miles.<br><br>Dogs of all sizes are allowed. Dogs may not be left alone in the room.

The well-equipped fitness center will let you work up an appetite for the free breakfast or you can take a dip in the seasonal outdoor swimming pool and hot tub. The in-room coffeemaker offers an early morning jolt before heading to a breakfast with fruit waffles pastries and more. Pets are welcome; parking is free. The hotel is just off of I-35W seven miles north of downtown Fort Worth. Several dining options are less than a half-mile away and the restaurant-packed Sundance Square district is just 10 minutes away by car.  Stay in the neighborhood for some of Fort Worth's best nightlife too. It's five miles to the Stockyards National Historic District where you can get a taste of Texas-style entertainment at a rodeo or learn how the city's livestock history earned it the name ''Cowtown.'' Speaking of animals you can visit more than 5000 of them at Fort Worth Zoo just 10 miles away. Meacham International Airport is three miles away and Dallas/Fort Worth International Airport is 17 miles away.<br><br>A dog up to 25 pounds is allowed. There are no additional pet fees, but there must be a credit card on file. Dogs must be leashed, cleaned up after, and a contact number left with the front desk if there is a pet alone in the room.

You can wolf down waffles and munch on muffins at the free continental breakfast in the cheerful breakfast room. An on-site fitness center lets guests pump some iron and the outdoor pool is the perfect spot to cool off after a long day. Soak in the soothing hot tub before grilling up some goodies on the on-site barbecue grills. Parking is on the house and the hotel offers a complimentary shuttle to and from the airport.  La Quinta Inn and Suites is six miles from George Bush Intercontinental Airport. The Greenspoint business district is a 15-minute drive and Willowbrook Mall is a 22-minute drive. You can watch the ponies run at the Sam Houston Race Park a 25-minute drive.<br><br>Two dogs of any size is allowed. There are no additional pet fees. Dogs must be leashed and cleaned up after. Dogs are not allowed to go through the lobby.

COMMENTS: Free continental breakfast free Wi-Fi an outdoor pool and free airport shuttle suit our guests at La Quinta Inn & Suites Irving-Las Colinas.  The two-floor La Quinta has 92 rooms all suites with coffee/tea makers microwaves and mini-fridges for convenience. Flip on the flat-panel TV for your favorite program or boot up the laptop and surf with free Wi-Fi. The breakfast is the bomb. It  includes a rotating menu of bacon or sausage biscuits and gravy hard-boiled eggs pastries bagels waffles hot and cold cereals muffins breads fruit coffee and more. It doesn't count as a real vacation if you don't swim in the seasonal outdoor pool and soak yourself in the hot tub. The hotel also has a fitness center business center with free internet laundry facility and free parking.  La Quinta is on MacArthur Blvd just west of Hwy 114. Dallas Fort Worth International Airport is nine miles northwest of the hotel accessible via free hotel shuttle. The hotel also offers a free shuttle to local corporations and offices. Shopaholics can head 12 miles northeast to Galleria Mall. Sixth Floor Museum at Dealey Plaza is 13 miles southeast of the hotel and the Cowboys and Rangers stadiums and Six Flags are clustered together about 15 miles south of the hotel. <br><br>Two dogs up to 20 pounds is allowed for no additional fee; there is a pet policy to sign at check in.

COMMENTS: Singled out for its free breakfast and added extras the three-story La Quinta Inn & Suites Jacksonville offers a pet-friendly option at attractive rates. The 79 non-smoking rooms come with free Wi-Fi pillowtop mattresses with upgraded linens granite countertops sleek cabinetry microwaves and refrigerators. Guests love digging into the free Bright Side Breakfast and dipping into the indoor pool. There's also the fully equipped fitness center to tackle a full-service business center and laundry facilities. Parking is free and pets are free to stay with you too. Located across from Jacksonville's lovely Nichols Green Park La Quinta Inn & Suites puts guests so close to so much including a string of restaurants that are a two-minute drive away. Local attractions include downtown Jacksonville and the Victorian houses at Bolton Park less than two miles north. Nature enthusiasts should make a beeline for Love's Lookout Overlook and Lake Jacksonville Park both no more than a 12-minute drive away. Wild times can also be had at Cherokee Trace Drive-Thru Safari (a 25-minute ride east of town) and Mudcreek Off-Road Park home of the Mud Nationals just a 10-minute easy ride up the road. The hotel is seven miles from Cherokee County Airport.<br><br>Dogs of all sizes are allowed. Dogs may not be left alone in the room.

COMMENTS: An outdoor pool complimentary Wi-Fi free breakfast and location off I-37 lure guests to the non-smoking La Quinta Inn and Suites Jourdanton. The three-story non-smoking La Quinta offers 79 rooms featuring pillowtop mattresses free Wi-Fi mini-fridges microwaves coffeemakers and flat-panel LCD HDTVs. Complimentary breakfast offers a tasty start to each day. Guests keep fit with workouts in the exercise room or by swimming in the year-round outdoor pool. Laundry facilities and a business center are also available. Pets are allowed. On-site parking is free.  One mile east of central Jourdanton La Quinta is nine miles off I-37 and 40 miles south of downtown San Antonio. The Longhorn Museum is less than two miles away and the Plestex Theatre is four miles away in Pleasanton. Wine connoisseurs make the 14-mile drive to Poteet Country Winery. The hotel is less than 11 miles from the U.S. Department of Agriculture and 48 miles from San Antonio International Airport. <br><br>Dogs of all sizes are allowed. COMMENTS: An outdoor pool complimentary hot breakfast and free Wi-Fi are the amenities guests enjoy at the non-smoking La Quinta Inn & Suites Houston Katy East. All 71 rooms at the mid-rise non-smoking La Quinta come with free Wi-Fi premium cable TV (HBO included) microwaves mini-fridges and coffeemakers. Fuel up at the complimentary hot breakfast ?? where you'll find waffles cereal muffins and more ?? then feel free to beat the Texas heat with a dip in the outdoor swimming pool. There's also a fitness center on site as well as a business center with print and copy capabilities. Pets are permitted here. Parking is free and a shuttle to local attractions is available. The hotel is seven miles from the Forbidden Gardens and five miles from both Old Town Katy and Katy Mills Mall. You'll find several restaurants within a five-minute drive of the hotel. Houston Executive Airport is 12 miles away and George Bush Intercontinental Airport is 41 miles away.<br><br>Dogs up to 50 pounds are allowed for no additional fee; there is a pet policy to sign at check-in. Guests with dogs must make arrangements for housekeeping, and put the Do Not Disturb sign on the door when there is a dog alone in the room.

COMMENTS: Low rates and nice amenities including free breakfast an indoor pool and a well-equipped fitness center get high ratings from our guests at the non-smoking La Quinta Inn & Suites Kerrville. The 65 spacious rooms in this low-rise hotel where pets are welcome for a fee come well-outfitted for both business and leisure travelers. The former will appreciate free high-speed internet access and a dataport phone with voicemail while all guests will find the refrigerator and microwave handy not to mention a cable TV and in-room coffee and tea. Peruse a complimentary copy of USA Today over breakfast which includes waffles fresh fruit and all the coffee you can drink. Afterwards get work done in the business center work out at the fitness center relax by the indoor heated pool and hot tub or imbibe even more coffee in the lobby where it's free all day and a cozy seating area with fireplace beckons you to stay awhile. Parking is free. The hotel is off I-10 close to restaurants and two miles from downtown Kerrville a charming city on the Guadalupe River. Discover the region's natural beauty at Riverside Nature Center two-and-a-half miles away or explore its artistic legacy at the Museum of Western Art three-and-a-half miles away. The authentic Y.O. Ranch is 42 miles from the hotel. San Antonio International Airport is about 61 miles away.<br><br>Dogs of all sizes are allowed. There are no additional pet fees. Dogs may not be left unattended, and they must be leashed and cleaned up after.

COMMENTS: Free breakfast with waffles a large outdoor pool and flat-panel TVs with HD programming complement value-friendly rates at La Quinta Inn Killeen which is next to Fort Hood shopping and dining. This pet-friendly hotel offers 105 rooms with free Wi-Fi coffeemakers hairdryers and irons/ironing boards not to mention flat-panel TVs with HD programming and plug-and-play features that make it easy to connect your electronics. Wake up on the bright side with a free continental breakfast starring hot waffles and fresh fruit and in the summer work on your tan line by the outdoor pool. Parking is free. Just off I-190 this hotel offers quick access to Fort Hood Army Base less than two miles away. Whether your mission involves visiting family at Darnall Army Hospital or exploring history at the 1st Cavalry Division Museum you'll be there in less than 10 minutes. Spend a relaxing day fishing at Stillhouse Hollow Lake about 15 minutes away then go for dinner and a movie at Killeen Marketplace three miles away. Killeen Fort Hood Regional Airport is six miles away.<br><br>Dogs of all sizes are allowed. There are no additional pet fees. Dogs must be leashed, cleaned up after, and crated when in the room unattended. Arrangements need to be made for housekeeping if the stay is more than 1 day.

COMMENTS: A gorgeous woodland setting distinguishes La Quinta Inn & Suites Woodlands NW - Magnolia where guests are treated to complimentary hot breakfasts internet access morning newspapers and private parking. Nestled in a nature preserve the four-story hotel is surrounded by fields of bluebonnets and other native flowers. Done up in neutral tones and emphasizing lots of richly stained wood the 60 rooms and suites have 37-inch flat-panel TVs with premium cable channels microwaves and mini-fridges. With free Wi-Fi the work desks with executive chairs become ideal temporary offices. Work out on the cardio and strength-training equipment in the fitness room or take a dip in the heated indoor pool and hot tub. Grab a free newspaper and head down to the smartly decorated dining room where a complimentary continental breakfast featuring piping-hot waffles is served every morning. A guest laundry comes in handy. Pets are allowed and parking is free. The hotel a short drive from Houston has a handy location about six miles from I-45. Rob Fleming Aquatic Center with its water slide and lazy river is 10 miles away. One of the year's most popular events the annual Texas Renaissance Festival is held in neighboring Plantersville 23 miles northwest. COMMENTS: Scoring essentials including free internet and a complimentary breakfast our guests also snag plenty of contemporary style at the non-smoking La Quinta Inn & Suites McKinney. This mid-rise hotel opened in 2010 is chic and contemporary with 79 rooms sporting sleek furnishings fresh accent wall shades and spa-like bathrooms with granite countertops and designer-style vanities. Guests can set their sights on flat-panel TVs with premium cable and free in-room internet. COMMENTS: Excellent amenities including free Wi-Fi a complimentary hot breakfast and a heated indoor pool get top ratings from our guests at the non-smoking La Quinta Inn & Suites Mt. Pleasant in Northeast Texas. Both business and leisure travelers enjoy the up-to-date decor and amenities in all 89 rooms of this four-story hotel: free Wi-Fi and wired internet premium cable microwaves mini-fridges complimentary coffee/tea dataport phones and voicemail. Waffles eggs and bacon are typical at the free daily breakfast and if your stay encompasses a Tuesday you'll get free appetizers and drinks in the evening too. Staying fit is easy with a fitness center and year-round heated indoor pool. When its time to relax slip into the hot tub or warm up with a free coffee and newspaper in the fireplaced lobby. Additional amenities include a business center and laundry facilities. Pets are allowed for a fee and parking is free. The hotel is located directly off I-30 between Dallas and Texarkana. Guests enjoy water sports and fishing in seven nearby lakes including Tankersley Lake about one mile away. There are numerous restaurants stores and a movie theater within a 10-minute drive. Dallas/Fort Worth International Airport is 133 miles away.<br><br>Dogs of all sizes are allowed for no additional fee; there is a pet policy to sign at check-in. A contact number must be left with the front desk when there is a dog alone in the room.

This non-smoking three-story hotel has 60 rooms. Each room includes free Wi-Fi a microwave mini-fridge cable TV with premium channels coffeemaker and hairdryer. Guests can start their day with a complimentary breakfast featuring a rotating menu of waffles cereal bread and muffins fresh fruit and beverages. The hotel also has a seasonal outdoor pool and hot tub. There is an on-site exercise gym business center and laundry services for guests' convenience. Parking is free. La Quinta Inn is located off Loop 256. The Palestine Mall is one mile away. Both the University of Texas - Tyler and the Palestine Civic Center are three miles. Tyler Pounds Regional Airport is 51 miles north.<br><br>Dogs of all sizes are allowed for no additional fee; there is a pet policy to sign at check-in. Dogs are not allowed in the common areas of the hotel, and a contact number left with the front desk if there is a dog alone in the room. Pets are allowed in smoking rooms only.

COMMENTS: Modern rooms with complimentary Wi-Fi a free hot breakfast and an indoor pool are among the amenities our guests enjoy at La Quinta Inn & Suites Pearsall.  Contemporary decor graces the lobby and 66 rooms of this four-story hotel. Both smoking and non-smoking rooms are available; all come nicely appointed with flat-panel HDTVs (with premium cable) mini-fridges microwaves coffeemakers armchairs desks and dataport phones with voicemail. Afterwards guests workout in the fitness center or enjoy the indoor pool and hot tub without having to slather up with sunscreen. They can also relax with a free coffee and newspaper in the lobby or get work done in the business center. Additional amenities include a convenience store guest laundry and free parking. Pets are allowed for a fee. The hotel is located off I-35 in Pearsall known as a ''hunter's paradise.'' There are several ranches in the area including Keystone Ranch 10 minutes away. Non-hunters can visit the Old Frio County Jail Museum two miles from the property or drive one hour to San Antonio to see The Alamo. Homey comforts include free high-speed internet flat-panel TVs with expanded cable microwaves and mini-fridges. Whether motivated to work work out or simply chill out guests have a well-equipped business center fitness room and outdoor pool/hot tub to accommodate their needs. COMMENTS: Top-notch in-room amenities plus a free hot breakfast and outdoor pool please our guests staying at the non-smoking La Quinta Inn & Suites Raymondville. COMMENTS: Free breakfast free Wi-Fi an outdoor pool and Rockport Beach Park two miles away are the lures of the non-smoking La Quinta Inn & Suites Rockport-Fulton for travelers.  Opened in 2013 La Quinta has 72 rooms in a three-floor building with stylish modern dcor and bright vivid colors. Rooms all come with pillowtop bedding coffee/tea makers microwaves mini-fridges free Wi-Fi and flat-panel TVs with 30 HD channels. Kitchenette suites are available. Worth getting out of bed for is the free breakfast with a rotating menu of scrambled eggs sausage potatoes muffins cereal and more. Stave off the Texas heat with a swim in the freeform outdoor pool featuring a mushroom water fountain and lounge chairs set in the shallow end so you can get your feet wet while you sunbathe. The deck has cabanas and barbecue grills. Also on-site are a fitness room business center convenience store coin-op laundry and free parking. Up to two pets per room are allowed.  La Quinta is located in Rockport a half-mile west of the Fulton Mansion State Historic Site and Aransas Bay. Rockport Beach Park and the Texas Maritime Museum are two miles south. If you're coming from the Corpus Christi metro area the hotel is 33 miles northeast of the city center and 40 miles northeast of Corpus Christi International Airport. <br><br>Dogs of all sizes are allowed. Dogs may not be left alone in the room.

COMMENTS: Proximity to the River Walk free breakfast and free Wi-Fi make La Quinta Inn & Suites San Antonio Riverwalk a winner with our guests. It comes highly recommended for business travelers and families alike. All 347 rooms in the 15-story pet-friendly La Quinta boast pillowtop mattresses microwaves mini-fridges and free Wi-Fi. Visit the fitness center to work up an appetite for the free breakfast which includes waffles fruit eggs and sausage. Get your paperwork done at the business center and then lounge beneath the palm trees at the outdoor swimming pool. Self park on-site for an additional fee or splurge for the valet. Grab a drink at the hotel lounge or stroll to one of many fine restaurants and bars in the neighborhood. La Quinta Inn & Suites San Antonio Riverwalk is right in the heart of the city's entertainment district. Simply let your feet do the walking to see all the top sights such as the Tower of the Americas two blocks from the hotel and The Alamo and River Walk three blocks away. The property is also just nine miles from San Antonio International Airport.<br><br>Dogs up to 20 pounds are allowed. There are no additional pet fees. Dogs must be leashed and cleaned up after. The Do Not Disturb sign must be on the door if there is a pet alone in the room, and arrangements made for housekeeping.

COMMENTS: Free breakfast free Wi-Fi and a convenient location near theme parks make the pet-friendly Comfort Inn & Suites San Antonio Fiesta a solid choice for our guests. The Comfort Inn & Suites has 93 non-smoking rooms over four floors and they all offer microwaves mini-fridges and free Wi-Fi and some rooms also feature jetted tubs. Start your day with free waffles eggs sausage and hot coffee for breakfast. Later on work out in the fitness room to get your adrenaline going. After a day sightseeing you can put in some office time at the business center or soak up the sun in the seasonal outdoor pool. The hotel also has on-site laundry facilities and free parking. The Comfort Inn is two miles from Six Flags Fiesta Texas The Shops at La Cantera The Rim Shopping Center and University of Texas at San Antonio. If you are looking for some water fun head to SeaWorld 10 miles west. All the attractions of downtown from the River Walk to The Alamo are 16 miles down the interstate. The hotel is also located 12 miles from San Antonio International Airport off I-10.<br><br>Dogs up to 35 pounds are allowed for no additional fee; there is a pet policy to sign at check-in. Speaking of coffee there's that and a whole lot more at the cornucopia of a free continental breakfast including waffles muffins breads hot and cold cereals hard-boiled eggs fruit yogurt juice and milk. Swimming is twice as nice when you get two outdoor pools to choose from. The hotel also has a fitness center and 24-hour front desk with tour assistance. Parking is on the house. La Quinta is located off I-90 next to Lackland Air Force Base. If you're driving from San Antonio International Airport the hotel is 17 miles southwest. SeaWorld is a seven-mile drive northwest. COMMENTS: Free breakfast complimentary Wi-Fi and a year-round heated outdoor pool are some of the prime perks our guests find at the non-smoking La Quinta Inn & Suites Schertz.At the four-story non-smoking La Quinta Inn & Suites all 81 rooms have mini-fridges microwaves coffeemakers free Wi-Fi and 42-inch TVs with premium cable channels. Each morning's complimentary breakfast includes waffles. Road warriors take care of work tasks in the business center while leisure guests unwind with a dip in the year-round heated outdoor pool. There's also a guest-use laundry facility on-site. Pets are allowed for a fee and parking is free. La Quinta Inn & Suites is off I-35 five miles from the Schertz Civic Center. It's eight from Natural Bridge Caverns and 20 miles from downtown San Antonio. San Antonio International Airport is 14 miles away.<br><br>Dogs of all sizes are allowed for no additional fee; there is a pet policy to sign at check-in. Dogs must be declared at the time of reservations. Guests with dogs must make arrangements for housekeeping, and the Do Not Disturb sign put on the door when there is a dog alone in the room.

In any of this mid-rise hotel's 80 rooms guests can use free Wi-Fi catch their favorite shows on a 42-inch flat-panel cable TV or store and make snacks in the mini-fridge and microwave. The heated indoor pool is a good way to unwind after a long day on the road; even better is a session in the hot tub. COMMENTS: A free hot breakfast buffet and Wi-Fi plus an easy-on/easy-off location near the interstate and the airport make La Quinta Inn Wichita Falls Airport Area a good choice for on-the-go travelers. There's a coffeemaker in every room and if you require a refrigerator or microwave the staff is happy to deliver one to your door. Parking is free. COMMENTS: National park proximity free Wi-Fi complimentary hot breakfast and a pool help push the non-smoking La Quinta Inn & Suites Moab to the top of our guests' list of favorite area properties. La Quinta Inn & Suites Moab offers value-added perks for budget-minded travelers ?? all 99 rooms provide microwaves mini-fridges and coffeemakers plus unexpected extras like flat-panel TVs with premium cable. Workout buffs like the fitness center seasonal outdoor pool and hot tub and road warriors appreciate the complimentary Wi-Fi business center conference facilities and private voicemail. The hotel also has a barbecue area with grills a playground and a laundry facility. Parking is on the house and pets are welcome. The hotel is right on Main Street in southern Moab within walking distance of several restaurants the Moab Information Center and a movie theater. The entrance to Arches National Park is six miles north Canyonlands National Park is about 45 minutes south and Dead Horse Point State Park is about 40 minutes. Canyonlands Field Airport with daily flights to Denver and Las Vegas is 19 miles northwest.<br><br>Dogs of all sizes are allowed. There are no additional pet fees. There is a pet waiver to sign at check in. Dogs must be leashed, cleaned up after, and crated if left alone in the room. Dogs are not allowed in the food areas, and they must be walked at the designated pet walk area.

COMMENTS: Free breakfast in-room microwaves and a seasonal outdoor pool all close to Zion National Park await our guests at the non-smoking La Quinta Inn & Suites at Zion Park/Springdale. The two-story La Quinta Inn & Suites at Zion Park/Springdale has 132 non-smoking rooms featuring premium bedding LCD TVs microwaves mini-fridges and coffeemakers. There are two on-site restaurants and a free breakfast is served each morning. Take advantage of the seasonal outdoor pool and 24-hour business and fitness facilities. Internet access is available for an additional fee. Parking is free and pets are allowed.  La Quinta is nestled at the base of Zion National Park less than 30 miles east of I-15 and three hours north of the Grand Canyon. The OC Tanner Amphitheatre is less than two miles away. Flights land 54 miles southwest at St. George Municipal Airport.<br><br>Dogs of all sizes are allowed. Dogs may not be left alone in the room.

COMMENTS: Freshly renovated digs free Wi-Fi an outdoor pool and pet-friendly accommodations help make for hassle-free stays at La Quinta Salem. Thanks to its 2010 renovation the three-story La Quinta's interiors are bursting with cool modern style. All 67 smoking and non-smoking rooms are outfitted with  light-wood furniture soothing color schemes and accent walls that have that offer a high-concept look. In-room comforts include free high-speed internet premium cable channels microwaves and mini-fridges. Start your day right at the free breakfast where you'll find waffles breads muffins fresh fruit and more. Work and workouts are easy here thanks to the business center and exercise room. There's also an outdoor pool open seasonally. As at all La Quinta properties pets can crash free. Parking is also free. Off Highway 419 and two-minutes from I-81 La Quinta offers easy access to the all the attractions in Salem and Roanoke. Hang Rock Golf Course is a 10-minute drive away. A diverse range of employers ?? including VA Medical Center GE Energy and Yokohoma Tire ?? are a 10- to 15-minute commute.  Roanoke Regional Airport is about six miles from the hotel.<br><br>Dogs up to 30 pounds are allowed for no additional fee; there is a pet policy to sign at check-in. Dogs may not be left alone in the room.

COMMENTS: A short walk from the beach and boardwalk two pools free Wi-Fi free parking and a complimentary daily breakfast make the non-smoking La Quinta Inn and Suites Virginia Beach the right mix of value amenities and convenience. The seven-floor La Quinta Inn & Suites features a cheerful sun-filled lobby and 136 non-smoking rooms equipped with premium bedding free Wi-Fi cable TVs and mini kitchens with microwaves and refrigerators. The hotel has everything guests need for a relaxing stay including a seasonal outdoor pool an arcade/game room a gym a laundry facilities and a business center. It is a happy place for Fido too who stays for no charge. Parking is also free. The hotel is on Pacific Avenue one block inland from the beach and several restaurants and shops along the boardwalk. The Virginia Aquarium and Marine Center and Ocean Breeze Waterpark are both within three miles of the hotel. The Virginia Beach Sports Complex is 10 miles away. Norfolk International Airport is 18.5 miles from the property.<br><br>Dogs of all sizes are allowed for no additional fee; there is a pet policy to sign at check-in. Dogs must be crated when left alone in the room and a contact number left with the front desk.

COMMENTS: With quick access to the highway an outdoor pool free Wi-Fi complimentary parking and free continental breakfast the non-smoking La Quinta Inn Norfolk Virginia Beach is a popular property with our guests. The three-story La Quinta Inn Norfolk Virginia Beach features 129 non-smoking rooms all with free Wi-Fi coffeemakers plump pillows and cable TVs with premium channels. The hotel has a seasonal outdoor pool and offers exercise enthusiasts complimentary passes to the local YMCA for daily workouts. Guests can gear up for the day with a complimentary breakfast that includes a selection of hot and cold items. The hotel provides free parking and welcomes pets for no extra charge. Centrally located near the intersection of I-64 and the Norfolk-Virginia Beach Expressway the La Quinta Norfolk Virginia Beach is convenient to local military bases and within five miles of Mount Trashmore Recreation Park which features one of the area's largest playgrounds. GTE Amphitheater is six miles from the hotel and the Virginia Marine Science Museum is 12 miles away. Norfolk International Airport is seven miles east of the property.<br><br>Dogs of all sizes are allowed. There are no additional pet fees. Dogs must be leashed, cleaned up after, and crated if left unattended in the room.

COMMENTS: Free breakfast complimentary internet access and an outdoor pool contribute to a comfortable stay at La Quinta Inn & Suites South Burlington conveniently located off I-89 between the University of Vermont and Burlington International Airport. The three-story hotel has 104 rooms featuring flat-panel TVs with premium cable and complimentary high-speed internet access. Additional room amenities include coffeemakers hairdryers and free local phone calls. The hotel has a business center and coin laundry facilities. Pack workout gear for the exercise room and a bathing suit for the outdoor pool. The complimentary breakfast buffet features waffles hot and cold cereals bagels fruit and more. La Quinta offers an airport shuttle from 5AM through midnight and welcomes pets for an additional fee. Parking is free and park-and-fly packages are available. The hotel is two miles from Lake Champlain the University of Vermont Burlington International Airport and Vermont National Golf Course. It's five miles to Magic Hat Brewery eight miles to the Vermont Teddy Bear Factory and 17 miles to Bolton Valley Ski Resort. <br><br>Dogs of all sizes are allowed for no additional fee; there is a pet policy to sign at check-in. The three-story hotel has 81 rooms featuring hairdryers coffeemakers and flat-panel TVs with premium cable. Internet access is complimentary and local calls are free. There's an on-site exercise room and an indoor heated pool. Each morning the hotel serves a complimentary continental breakfast and coffee and tea are always available in the lobby. Additional amenities include meeting space and a coin laundry. Parking is complimentary and pets may stay for an extra fee.   The hotel is fewer than two miles from the downtown area and Saint Albans Historical Museum. It's 20 miles to Saint-Armand just over the border in Canada and 50 miles to Plattsburgh New York. Burlington International Airport the University of Vermont and ECHO Lake Aquarium and Science Center are 30 miles away. <br><br>Dogs of all sizes are allowed for no additional fee; there is a pet policy to sign at check-in. Guests must have current proof of rabies inoculation and vaccinations. Dogs may not be left alone in the room for more than 2 hours, the Do Not Disturb sign must be on the door, and a contact number left with the front desk.

COMMENTS: A central location heated indoor pool free Wi-Fi breakfast and parking are among the amenities our guests enjoy at La Quinta Inn Lynnwood. The five-story La Quinta Inn has 101 rooms all featuring free Wi-Fi cable TVs coffeemakers and mini-fridges. Non-smoking accommodations are available. Guests can get their morning started with the complimentary breakfast or a dip in the heated indoor pool open year-round. The hotel also has a hot tub fitness center business center and theater-style meeting facilities. Parking is complimentary. Pets are welcome for an additional fee. Nestled off I-5 La Quinta Inn is 16 miles north of downtown Seattle and one-and-a-half miles from shopping at Alderwood Mall. A 10-minute drive west leads guests to Edmonds Community College and Lynnwood Municipal Golf Course. The hotel lies 15 minutes from Edmonds Underwater Park and Port of Edmonds. Boeing Company is nine miles north Microsoft is 22 miles south and Lynnwood Convention Center is a half-mile away. Seattle-Tacoma International Airport is 29 miles south.<br><br>Dogs of all sizes are allowed, and 2 dogs per room are preferred, but 3 dogs are ok if they are small dogs. There are no additional pet fees. Dogs may not be left unattended, and they must be leashed and cleaned up after. Dogs are not allowed in any of the food areas.

COMMENTS: Free continental breakfast and Wi-Fi await near the Space Needle at the non-smoking La Quinta Inn & Suites Seattle.  The seven-floor La Quinta has 72 rooms all with free local calls free weekday newspapers and flat-panel TVs with premium cable. Coffeemakers mini-fridges and microwaves are also part of the package as is free Wi-Fi access. Don't rush out the door in the morning without stopping by the buffet table for the free continental breakfast of make-your-own waffles hot and cold cereals bread bagels pastries muffins fresh fruit coffee and juice. Work out in the fitness center and freshen your wardrobe in the guest laundry facility. Parking is available for an extra charge.  The hotel is in downtown Seattle on Eighth Avenue seven blocks east of the Space Needle. Next door to the Needle are IMAX Theaters Pacific Science Center Experience Music Project and Science Fiction Museum. You can catch the Seattle Center Monorail or a city bus to downtown and its many attractions like Pike Place Market. If you're driving from Sea-Tac International Airport the hotel is 15 miles north. <br><br>Dogs of all sizes are allowed. There are no additional pet fees. COMMENTS: Free Wi-Fi continental breakfast an indoor pool a hot tub and a sauna plus a fitness center and accommodations for pets add up to a satisfying experience for our guests staying at the non-smoking La Quinta Inn & Suites Wenatchee. Guests at the three-floor La Quinta Inn start off their mornings with a complimentary breakfast that includes hot waffles. All 65 rooms have free Wi-Fi dataport phones and cable TVs with premium channels. Select rooms have microwaves and mini-fridges. Suites with hot tubs are available. Pets are welcome for an additional fee. Unwind after work in the heated indoor pool hot tub or sauna. There is also a fitness room for more invigorating exercise. Other amenities include a business center a guest laundry and a convenience store with snacks and sundries. Parking is free. Two minutes off Highway 2 La Quinta Inn is a seven-minute walk from the Wenatchee Confluence State Park the Apple Capital Recreational Loop Trail and Columbia River access. COMMENTS: Free breakfast Wi-Fi access and a location convenient to downtown make La Quinta Inn & Suites Appleton - College Avenue a good deal in a great spot. The two-story 99-room hotel has a convenience store right on-site making quick work of the odd-hour craving. Speaking of quick work get it done in the hotel's business center or make use of the hotel Wi-Fi connection via your laptop. Suites thoughtfully include microwaves mini-fridges and coffeemakers to make your food and beverage activity that much easier. There's a fitness center where you can work the kinks out or take the relaxed route and have them massaged out in the hot tub. There is also an indoor pool and even a game room. Every morning you'll find a free breakfast waiting including waffles pastries and other treats plus all the coffee and juice you can handle. Pets are welcome and parking on-site is free. The hotel sits just off Highway 41 two miles from downtown. The hotel offers local business and airport shuttles for an additional fee and there are two bus stops within a few minutes' walk. There are plenty of restaurants right along the strip and it's a stone's throw to Funset Boulevard amusement center a family favorite. Appleton's renovated downtown is a treasure trove of stores with a free trolley to ferry you around the shops and riverfront. It's three miles to Lawrence University and only a few minutes' drive to Lake Winnebago. Outagamie County Regional Airport is three miles and Green Bay's Austin Straubel International Airport is 31 miles away.<br><br>Dogs of all sizes are allowed. There are no additional pet fees. Dogs must be leashed, cleaned up after, and crated if they are left in the room alone. Dogs are not allowed in the common areas.

COMMENTS: Big suite-like rooms a complimentary shuttle anywhere within a five-mile radius and a free breakfast buffet are among the highlights at La Quinta Inn & Suites Milwaukee Glendale. With a stately facade the four-story La Quinta Inn & Suites is easy to find. The two-story-tall lobby has elegant seating areas where you would be comfortable meeting with clients or chatting with friends. A free buffet breakfast served in the pretty dining area includes hot items like waffles with your favorite toppings. If you need your morning coffee a pot is always brewing. In the bright atrium there's a lovely swimming pool and hot tub and in a nearby room is a fitness area with cardio equipment. Kids love playing games in the arcade. The 109 non-smoking rooms are equipped with free Wi-Fi. Refrigerators and microwaves are much-appreciated amenities as are in-room coffeemakers. There's a desk with an executive chair where you can get some work done. Parking is free. North of downtown La Quinta Inn & Suites has an easy-to-find location off I-43. From the front door you can walk to several restaurants for tasty meals and to the eclectic shopping opportunities at Bayshore Town Center. Lincoln Park Golf Course is nearby a boon for golfers. COMMENTS: Offering free Wi-Fi and breakfast with waffles La Quinta Inn Pleasant Prairie Kenosha is surrounded by many Kenosha attractions including Six Flags and outlet shopping. Complimentary high-speed internet access and flat-panel HDTVs with pay-per-view movies and Nintendo await guests staying in one of the 91 rooms at the two-story La Quinta Inn. Rooms also have work desks and coffeemakers. The 24-hour front desk can assist you with copy and fax services. After helping yourself to complimentary waffles and more in the hotel's breakfast area freshen your wardrobe at the guest laundry. Pets are allowed and non-smoking rooms are available. Located within two blocks of many fast-food and sit-down restaurants La Quinta Inn is a three minute drive from I-94 and four miles from Pleasant Prairie Premium Outlets. Drive 16 miles for a day of family fun at Six Flags Great America or 10 miles to the University of Wisconsin - Parkside. It's 37 miles to Miller Park and 28 miles to General Mitchell International Airport.<br><br>Dogs of all sizes are allowed. There are no additional pet fees. COMMENTS: Free breakfast and free Wi-Fi top the list of extras that make the non-smoking La Quinta Inn Sheboygan a top-ranked pick for our guests.  At the two-story La Quinta 96 rooms and suites come with coffeemakers and flat-panel HDTVs with premium cable channels and plug-and-play capability. Free Wi-Fi and free local calling help you stay in touch while you're on the road. Enjoy a satisfying free breakfast before heading out for work or play. You can print boarding passes send a fax or answer emails in the business center and then melt away calories in the fitness room. La Quinta also features free parking and fax/copy services at the 24-hour front desk. Handicap-accessible rooms are available and pets are welcome for an additional fee. La Quinta is three miles west of downtown Sheboygan and two miles from the shores of Lake Michigan. Guests in town for an event at the John Michael Kohler Arts Center are eight minutes away and those on a campus visit are six minutes from the University of Wisconsin-Sheboygan and 20 minutes from Lakeland College. The non-smoking La Quinta has 90 rooms in a five-floor building with colorful and contemporary interiors. Rooms come with coffee/tea makers microwaves mini-fridges free Wi-Fi flat-panel TVs with expanded cable and comfy beds with pillowtop mattresses. BUYCODE: 700206026
COMMENTS: The freebies include breakfast internet access and parking at La Quinta Inn Cheyenne making it a sweet deal for our guests. All 105 rooms at the three-story La Quinta include free wired high-speed internet premium cable TV and coffeemakers. Start the day with a complimentary Bright Side Breakfast ?? a continental spread of waffles hot and cold cereal pastries yogurt juice and coffee. Relax in the outdoor swimming pool and hot tub during summer months or hit the refresh button on your wardrobe at the on-site laundry facility. Pets are allowed for an additional fee. Parking including space for trucks is free. La Quinta Inn is located two miles west of downtown less than six miles from Cheyenne Regional Airport. You'll find a number of restaurants within walking distance. The Wyoming State Capitol Cheyenne Botanical Gardens and Francis E. Warren Air Force Base are all less than five miles away.<br><br>Dogs of all sizes are allowed. There are no additional pet fees. Dogs may not be left unattended, and they must be leashed and cleaned up after.

LAUNDRYROOM: 
PHONE: 307-362-1770
STATE: WY
LAT: 
BUYCODE: 700206191
COMMENTS: Free breakfast snacks Wi-Fi and parking the outdoor pool and a pet-friendly policy are among the perks our guests enjoy at the Baymont Inn & Suites Rock Springs. This hotel has two floors and 130 rooms that all feature work desks coffeemakers free Wi-Fi and cable TVs with pay movies and video games. Select rooms have microwaves and non-smoking accommodations are available. Begin your day with a complimentary continental Breakfast before venturing out to explore the area. Refresh in the late afternoon with complimentary popcorn cookies and other snacks. The hotel offers a seasonal outdoor pool fitness room business center and guest Laundromat. On-site parking is free for guests and pets are welcome. The hotel is right next door to White Mountain Mall and within three miles of downtown and Rock Springs Historical Museum. The hotel's easy access to I-80 gives guests a quick start to exploring the outdoors. Fishermen head to Green River a 20-minute drive or Green River Whitewater Park about 30 minutes away. Attractions within 40 minutes include Expedition Island National Historic Landmark Pilot Butte Wild Horse Scenic Loop Tour and Flaming Gorge Recreation Area about 40 minutes away. Rock Springs-Sweetwater County Airport is 14 miles from the hotel.<br><br>Dogs of all sizes are allowed. There are no additional pet fees. Dogs may not be left unattended at night, and they must be leashed, cleaned up after, and attended to or removed for housekeeping.
